name: Extreme Cream Anti-Aging, Firming, & Lifting Refillable Moisturizer
about: What it is:A luxurious moisturizer that is clinically shown to visibly firm, lift, contour, and reduce sagging while nourishing the skin barrier..Skin Type:Dry and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- 7% Lifting Peptides: Visibly reduce sagging and improve the contours of facial features for a more youthful look..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:A unique reverse emulsion gives this moisturizer its addictive, luxurious texture that leaves skin with the ultimate glow. High levels of clinically backed ingredients, including peptides, bio-retinol, and ceramides, combine for a fast-acting formula that visibly firms and lifts while improving the look of contours of the face. This fragrance-free formula is hypoallergenic and tested and safe for sensitive skin.
ingredients: -7% Lifting Peptides: Visibly reduce sagging and improve the contours of facial features for a more youthful look..-2% Bio-Retinol: Visibly reduces wrinkles, firms, and boosts elasticity for smoother skin..-3X Ceramides: Strengthen skin's natural moisture barrier for healthy, glowing skin...Water (Aqua), C13-15 Alkane, Squalane, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-5 Polyricinoleate, Bisabolol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Magnesium Sulfate, Panthenol, Glyceryl Behenate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Heptapeptide-7, Acetyl Sh-Hexapeptide-5 Amide Acetate, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 Sh-Polypeptide-76, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Ceramide NP, Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract, Allantoin, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Arginine, Glycosphingolipids, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Tetraacetylphytosphingosine, Polyglyceryl-6 Octastearate, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Carnosine, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Quaternium-90 Bentonite, Mica, Triethyl Citrate, Zinc Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Calcium Gluconate, Hydroxyacetophenone...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean face and neck both AM and PM as your moisturizer step. .-Pairs beautifully under makeup...Recycling Instructions:.-For every product they sell, iNNBEAUTY PROJECT funds the removal of two units of plastic from landfills, waterways, and marine environments to be recycled and repurposed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time writing a Sephora review and Iu2019m an employee. Tried this product on a whim while it was on sale after eyeing it during my shifts. I turned 30 this year and I am slowly trying to get into anti aging products. Id been using elfu2019s retinol pretty heavily and thought it was making my skin look awful, until I realized retinol can dry your skin and I needed a better moisturizer. I immediately noticed a huge difference in my skin after using this product and my face seemed more toned, mature, contoured, glowy, sexy, whatever you want to call it. I used it daily and nightly and didnu2019t get any new breakouts and saw my acne marks fading. I was shocked at how even and bright my skin looked and I was on my way to not even needing foundation. Then came the dreaded day - I pressed the pump and nothing but air came out. That was also the day I realized that the huge bottle really only held a 1.7 ounce tube. Even with my discount, I feel $48 for a miracle cream that only lasted a month or so is kind of steep (for me). However, as soon as I stopped using it, my face started breaking out in a way that  it hadnu2019t for weeks. Idk if thatu2019s a coincidence or not, but I didnu2019t even break out during my cycle while using this cream. So while Iu2019d either love a cheaper price or a bigger bottle, I think about this cream every day since I ran out and will repurchase, but I will also find a cheaper but effective alternative to use every other day to make the cream last longer. If price per ounce isnu2019t an issue for you, then this is a five star, amazing product that you probably wonu2019t be able to do without. Pic is no filter, just hourglass concealer on my under eye and some bronzer. Horminal acne marks used to be pretty bad around my jawline and chin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never be buying from this brand again and Iu2019m very disappointed in Sephora for carrying it. I made the mistake of not checking the ounces for the bottle. But I was moving quick and saw a big bottle and it felt heavy so I thought I was getting a jar full of moisturizer. Only to get home and find out the glass jar is just a case for the actual bottle of lotion, which is about half the size. I felt totally deceived. I reached out to the company and they told me their mission is sustainability, which is why they encourage people to just buy the refills. But I said, if you cared about sustainability why even have this glass part, it serves no purpose other than marketing, in a deceptive way. I honestly donu2019t care how the product is, Iu2019ll never buy this brand again. And I may consider if I even want to keep shopping at Sephora for being deceptive. Would not recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving the INNBEAUTY extreme cream firming & lifting moisturizer!! Itu2019s soo moisturizing while not being too heavy and thick. It makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated and is the perfect everyday moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: INNBEAUTY Project's Extreme Cream Moisturizer is a powerhouse for dry and dehydrated skin. This rich, thick cream delivers intense hydration, leaving the skin feeling deeply nourished and plump. It's formulated with a blend of ceramides, fatty acids, and antioxidants, which work together to strengthen the skin barrier and lock in moisture. The non-greasy finish makes it suitable for both day and night use, and it layers well under makeup. Many users appreciate its ability to soothe and calm irritation, especially during harsh weather conditions. The formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and free from harsh chemicals, making it ideal for those who prefer clean beauty products. However, the richness of the cream might be too heavy for oily or combination skin types. Overall, it's a standout product for those in need of serious moisture and skin barrier support.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has definitely been a new staple in my morning skincare routine! It has left my face feeling tightened and hydrated! I love the glow it gives to my skin! I have sensitive skin so I was excited to try it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Extreme Cream Firming & Lifting Moisturizer has quickly become a favorite of mine! It leaves my skin feeling deeply hydrated, smooth, and glowing. I've noticed a real difference in firmness and the reduction of fine lines. The formula is gentle on my sensitive skinu2014no clogged pores or irritation, which is a huge plus. The plant-based retinol and lifting peptides really deliver on their promises, and the triple ceramides have strengthened my skinu2019s moisture barrier. This moisturizer lives up to the hype and then some!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this by Innbeauty. I am so impressed with how smooth and lifted my skin looks. This is exactly what I needed for my skin all along. Thank you for creating this magical cream. Itu2019s a win and I am obsessed. Check out my before & after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! Definitely get this if youu2019re feeling old. I feel like my skin looks how it looked five years ago and I needed that for my sanity plus packaging is so cute. I highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

I used to Charlotte tilbury magic cream under my makeup. 1. I donu2019t even think it was that good 2 it was WAY more expensive. This is a huge upgrade and itu2019s even cheaper. Love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the past couple months, Iu2019ve been struggling with super Duper dry skin that gets really really itchy and makes it almost impossible to apply make up because Iu2019m constantly itching my face. I was looking for something that would really do great underneath my make up and provide that full moisture that I needed this product is amazing. Itu2019s applies on so nicely. The formula feels great and itu2019s so hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for the past few weeks.  It works well on my mature skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about some of the claims this product made, but I really trust the Gloss Angeles team so was happy to try this product out when the opportunity came. I have been so happy with the results!    Here's what I Loved:   - I experienced no redness or irritation. In fact, my redness cleared up. I do experience    redness from rosacea and for full transparency of this review I was going through a period of    irritation with more redness than usual (as seen in the photos). This went away and my skin    has far less redness than usual.   - The compliments! My skin has become noticeably more plump/glowy since starting this    cream. This is not going to be a humble statement, but I have normally have really good skin    with the exception of my rosacea (ie; minimal lines and minimal breakouts) and am often    complimented on it. The compliments have more than doubled since the effects of this    cream have kicked in.   - This cream has noticeably reduced the fine lines around my eyes.   -  My skin is very hydrated and has a great glow after using   - I love the way it feels on my skin u2013 smooth, hydrated, and glowy, without being greasy.   What I Didn't Notice or Didn't Love:    - I haven't noticed any improvement in sagging skin. I have only been using this product once     a day at night though, so Iu2019m curious to see after my second bottle.   - The cream causes my sunscreen to pill, so I have to wash my face in the morning before    applying it. This isn't something I've had with other night creams, I'm usually good to just    splash water on my face and proceed with my morning skincare.   Despite the couple of drawbacks, glow and fine line reduction has made this a staple. I'm excited to see how a second bottle does with the sagging benefit claimed. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so silky smooth, leaving my combination feeling hydrated but not greasy. I wore it in the morning before my sunscreen and at night with other products. There were no issues with my usual skincare and makeup. The bottle is solid and glass, so take care around tile floors. I plan to reorder, and I genuinely feel it is a luxury. It has made my skin so smooth with no tackiness. I'm sold!  Thank you, Gloss Angeles Confidential, for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: This cream actually does make a difference!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Too bad this cream wasn't invented 20 years ago! I've noticed a real difference in the texture and tone of my skin after using it for two months. It looks smoother and more velvety, and there's no oily sheen on my skin after I use it. Best of all, it seems to be having an effect on my neck. I like that Innbeauty products are not tested on animals and that the ingredients are proven to work. The price is also great considering the high quality. I'm very skeptical about  beauty hype, which is why I decided to write an honest review.

reviews.review_title: Loving this for a glow up!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product now for a few months. I absolutely love it! It really did give me a glow from the very first few uses. My coworker even noticed the glow. As for the consistency of te product, its not heavy at all. Sometimes I even use this right under my foundation and it helped my foundation not to cake up. There is also not much of a scent which is good! Thank you Gloss Angeles confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a great idea to have refillable moisturizer for this product at a lesser price.  I bought the one with the pump first of course and the product lasted 10 months which to me is worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I reviewed this as part of Gloss Angeles Confidential. I loved this product and would recommend it! Itu2019s got a great texture and it felt like it delivered great results. I wish I took before and after pictures as I do think Iu2019d see firmer, plumper skin. My skin just feels happy and content. I do think some folks with sensitive skin could find this a bit bothersome, but my skin seemed to love this. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In short, I am obsessed with this moisturizer. I canu2019t believe itu2019s so efficacious and luxurious feeling yet at such a good price point. My only gripe is the packaging - I wish it were not as clunky so I could travel with it more easily. Other than that the product itself is glorious! It makes my skin feel so hydrated and plump! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream does deliver what it promises. It moisturizes and gives a dewy finish to my skin. In the month Iu2019ve been using the cream  I have seen a reduction of lines between my eyebrows giving a supple look to my forehead.  It is a very hydrating and lightweight cream that can be used for day and night to moisturize and work its magic. One thing I did not like is that sometimes it would pill after applying sunscreen, but maybe itu2019s the ingredients in my sunscreen that does not go together with the product. Overall, the product is great and  I would definitely buy again.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity.

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to test Extreme Cream courtesy of Gloss Angeles Confidential and I've really enjoyed incorporating this moisturizer to my skincare routine. For a month, I used it both morning and night, and it layered perfectly with all my other productsu2014no pilling at all. There is a herbal scent that is nice but fades quickly. The formula is unique, feeling both light and moisturizing. A little goes a long way, and it worked well in both dry/hot and cooler/humid climates with some adjustments to the amount used. It seems perfect for drier skin or winter months. Since I have acne-prone skin, I did get some minor breakouts, especially when I used too much, but they healed quickly. I noticed a bit of firming and plumping too, which is greatu2014I love a multi-benefit product to streamline my skincare routine. I usually use AB Rich Cream, and this felt similar (both the product and packaging) but at a more accessible price point. I would repurchase, especially for colder, drier months or to use with a stronger retinol. I love the refill option too. Overall, it's been a great addition to my skincare routine. I think this brand is doing some really interesting things and I'm excited to try more of their products. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had been looking forward to trying this product, and I can report that after several weeks of use, it has been a game changer for me. I'm typically pretty skeptical about creams on my face because my skin tends to run oily and acne prone with only minimal dry patches here and there. I have had no adverse side effects from using this product - no additional oiliness and no breakouts. In fact, my breakouts have been less over the last few weeks. I applied the product to clean skin every morning and most nights. I've noticed smoother, more radiant skin over the last several weeks. The packing is functional and pleasing to the eye, should you want/need to leave it out on your counter or vanity. I LOVE the size of the bottle and the pump is easy to use. The price of this product would be my only hesitation in purchasing it because I don't typically spend that much on moisturizers; however, I feel you get so much more product that you typically would in a bottle at the same price point, and so I would absolutely spend the money on this.   All in all, I'm excited to add Extreme Cream to my regular routine. Anyone who has complimented my skin in the last month has been given my recommendation for this product. Big thank you to Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extreme Cream has been a game-changer for me. After trying several products from pricier brands, Extreme Cream delivered the most noticeable results, particularly on my eyes and laugh lines. The lines have visibly reduced. I have sensitive skin and the first few days had a couple small breakouts.  I loved the consistency of the cream, and the scent was subtle enough not to bother me. The formula itself is perfect, the best consistency. Layered well under SPF. I tested it in incredibly humid climate and found that I can only use this cream at night. Thank you, Gloss Angeles Confidential, for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great moisturizer! After weeks of use, I think my skin looked smoother and tighter than it had before I started using this product. The results of this product are great but I wish it had a more elegant feel upon application. Also, I don't love how huge the packaging is. It's a very large and bulky bottle. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got to test the Extreme Cream for a month thanks to Glossangeles Confidential. I have dry, finicky skin that is often reactive to acne treatments and actives. I wasn't sure how my skin would react to this moisturizer. After a month of using it, I am super impressed with how my skin looks and feels! It allowed me to use fewer extra serums and products (though it does play well with others!) without my skin searching for extra moisture. I can't definitively say it firmed or lifted my skin, but I am pleased with the texture of my skin from regular use.  It is more expensive than my usual moisturizer, but it does a marvelous job. I would definitely purchase this again.

reviews.review_title: Caused sensitivity and persistent reactive acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I intended to test this product for a month as part of a promotion with Gloss Angeles. I made it two weeks and had to stop due to increased sensitivity around my eyes and reactive acne around my nose and chin. Iu2019m still trying to clear up the acne more than three weeks since discontinuing use. Some positives: The packaging is nice, if bulky. The product sets into the skin nicely, and makeup looked great on top of it (before the acne flare up). I havenu2019t identified what ingredient caused my reaction, but I hope this works for someone with less sensitive skin. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for a few weeks courtesy of Gloss Angeles Confidential. The texture is unique because itu2019s super lightweight but it sort of melts into a watery texture on the skin. Even though itu2019s lightweight itu2019s VERY moisturizing. Since I have combo skin, I didnu2019t love using this during the day under makeup, especially in the heat of the summer. However Iu2019ve been using it at night and have noticed my skin is looking smoother and a little more radiant. It plays well with the serums I am using too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for a moisturizer for about 6 months as my skin is changing. I am just shy of 40 with normal to sensitive skin and still struggle with breakouts usually around my period. Living in the high desert I can't express how dry the air the is, so finding something that can hydrate my aging skin in an arid climate is tall order when everything seems to cause breakouts. Well, InnBeauty Extreme Cream checked all the boxes for me.   I used four (4) pumps morning and night for the last five weeks and my skin has never felt more hydrated and looked more luminous. It's suppose to firm your skin as well, and I'm not sure I've noticed that, but overall my skin really does look amazing with an even tone and glow from within.  When you pump this out you'll find it to be really thick, don't be scared if you're breakout prone. As you apply it to your face and neck it instantly thins out due to its reverse emulsion technology. After I worried about it being too thick, then I worried it wouldn't moisturize as well because of how it thinned out, feeling almost water-y. My concerns were quickly soothed as it sunk into my skin and felt great! I use to have to use so much light weight moisturizer followed by an oil at night only to wake up to bone dry skin. Not with Extreme Cream. I wake up just as hydrated as when I went to bed.   A few asides: The bottle itself is pretty heavy and feel luxe if that's a feature you like, I don't typically. I did NOT notice a smell of any kind on my first bottle, but did on my second. Some people were saying it smells like crayons or sunscreen a bit. I do get that now on my second purchase, but due to how well the product works I don't really mind.  All in all, I am a total convert to this product, and into my second bottle (Sephora was out of the refill). If you're struggling with your barrier, or need hydration this could be a great option. And for under $50!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since entering my 30s, Iu2019ve felt very u201cmehu201d about my skin. My skincare routine simply maintained the status quo; while my skin hasnu2019t looked awful (acne free, normal/combination), it also hasnu2019t looked great (fine lines, minor sagging, dullness, acne scars). Enter Extreme Cream. Since using it, Iu2019ve gotten more compliments in the past few weeks than I have in the past few years! The reverse emulsion texture is so luxe, and I do notice an immediate glow and plumping effect after applying. This plays well with my SPF (no pilling), and makeup sits very nicely on it. It might be too soon to say for certain, but after a month of consistent use, my cheeks seem a bit tighter and smile lines are not quite as apparent as a result. My only two critiques are that the bottle is excessively bulky/heavy and I am unsure if this cream will be moisturizing enough in the winter time. Regardless of those concerns, I have already purchased a refill and look forward to seeing what this cream does with long term use. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Extreme Cream proves that a good moisturizer doesnu2019t have to cost a lot! First of all, if you are like me and hating sticking fingers into jars and risking contamination, youu2019ll love the packaging of the Extreme Cream! The convenient pump dispenses the perfect amount each time; 2-3 pumps suffice to cover my face and neck.    I've been using this moisturizer for over a month now and plan to use every last drop. Since itu2019s a little heavier than some of my other moisturizers, I mainly use it at nighttime and occasionally in the mornings if my skin is feeling extra dry that day. Extreme Cream provides intense hydration, leaving my skin looking and feeling great even after a long day. The best part is the incredible instant glow it gives my skin. I've received numerous compliments on my radiant complexion since I started using Extreme Cream.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extreme cream was amazing. I've tried a few products from pricier brands recently asnd extreme cream left the most noticeable results on my neck where I've begun to see clear signs of aging and the lines probably reduced by ~30%. I also have slightly sensitive skin and this didn't break me out like other retinol products/retinol alternatives. I really liked the consistency. The scent wasn't that noticeable for me, but I'm not bothered by scents unless they smack me in the face. Nothing about the cream should be improved upon, but the bottle could be smaller/not glass for travel and shipping weight reasons. I never wear makeup, but it wore well under spf. I wore it both in incredibly humid and relatively dry climates and it worked well in both.   I already purchased another bottle, but will be purchasing again. I used it for a little over a month so far. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Lux feeling and glow after 2 weeks!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had been eye this moisturizer for a while based on the hype online. After a month of using it twice a day for the past month I was pleased with the overall results I saw. The texture is very luxurious and it layered well with my makeup and sunscreen (no pilling at all). About two weeks in I noticed a soft improvement in both the texture and glow of my skin. I started getting compliments from friends that my skin was looking so good. My one con for this product is the packagingu2014 itu2019s large, breakable, and a hassle to pack when traveling. I donu2019t plan to continue using it and would recommend. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product AM/PM for a month and was truly surprised by how much I liked it. I usually rotate between moisturizers (Drunk Elephant, Weleda, Clinque, etc.) without much thought, however after two weeks of using this I knew I'd repurchase. I have dry skin and love the glow this gives after application.On myosin it goes on quickly and the extreme shininess resolves in 15 minutes. It works well under SPF and make-up (no pilling!). I did notice some bumps around my mouth the first week I used this, but I am unsure the cause. I did also notice the sunscreen-y smell other reviewers did but that did not bother me. I love the formula and the I do think the claims hold up. I did notice my skin felt firmer with regular use. I have already re-purchased a refill. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the moisturizer from Gloss Angeles Confidential to try and review. In the beginning I was not too impressed as it left a kind of a film on my skin but soon realized I was applying to much which caused me to have an oily film. I then started to use one pump and felt it was perfect for me. It blended well with my serum and sunscreen and I feel it improved my skin texture after 2 weeks. What I really like  is that I can apply makeup on top and feel like thanks to the moisturizer it stavs londer. Feels like it kinda acts like a stronger primer. I was honestly pleasantly surprised by it and it was the first time I used this brand. Will definitely buy it once I run out! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

After using this for a month the main benefit I see is the firming effect & improved skin barrier! I used this on the East & West Coast (morning and night) and I preferred it in drier climates. Sometimes in East Coast humidity, it feels like water is sitting on top of my skin. It still wears well under makeup and dries down in time, it just takes a little extra time to absorb. I love the glow it gives! I'm undecided if I will buy it in the future, but I had a good experience with it. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this moisturizer but Iu2019m not sure about the firming claims (especially the line about u201cimproving facial contoursu201d)! My skin looked smooth after using it for four weeks but prior to using this I was a regular user of tretinoin and exfoliated regularly, so my skin was pretty smooth to begin with. I do think this is a very nice formulation! I like that it is very moisturizing but lightweight. Itu2019s also a good price point and will last a decent amount of time for me at least, as I only needed one pump in the morning and two at night. It wore well under SPF, but it definitely gives a glow due to how moisturizing it is. If youu2019re looking for a reasonably priced moisturizer, I think this one has a lot of great benefits, even if I didnu2019t notice much of a difference in firmness! I would repurchase, especially since there is a refill option for even less! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my late 30s and have dry skin. I used the Extreme Creme to help with loss of firmness in my skin. I really enjoyed using this product as part of my daily skincare routine. It left my skin glowy and moisturized without any stickiness. The texture of the cream feels very luxurious on my face and has a light scent. I used it before sunscreen and foundation and it layered nicely. After a month of using it, I don't see any noticable lifting effects, however I will continue to use and also purchase a refill (love that feature!).  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this, and at first- I did! It has a faint woodsy/herbal scent that I found soothing... almost like walking into a yoga studio or spa. It felt luscious and hydrating upon application, but not too thick-- which was a concern of mine being that I have combo skin that leans more oily this time of year. Initially it seemed great, just a bit thick for my AM routine as it left me looking a little greasy. But really liked using it in the PM, as I'd wake up feeling like my skin was nicely hydrated.   That said, about 1.5 weeks later I had to stop using the cream as I noticed I was consistently getting a new blemish/breakout every day. At first I thought it was just hormones and bad lunch, but eventually I pointed to the cream and after I stopped using it, my breakouts subsided. I've had a similar reaction to another barrier-repair marketed product, so it may be a reaction to a specific ingredient or just that it's too much congestion this time of year for my skin type. I'm cautiously interested in testing this product out again in my PM routine when the weather cools down, but ultimately this wasn't a fit for me.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over 4 weeks and can confidently say this will become a staple in my routine.   What I love about it: - I have dry to combo skin and this is so moisturizing without being greasy. I can feel the difference the second it hits my skin. I took it on a two week vacation with me during the testing period and was able to use this as my sole moisturizer day and night. Also have had no issues with combining it with SPF or pilling under makeup. Those with oily skin may consider opting to only use it once per day since it is extremely moisturizing.   Areas for improvement: - My only complaint about this product is the packaging - while the glass packaging is beautiful and makes it feel luxurious, it is much too bulky and heavy for travel. I opted to remove the glass packaging for travel but the top dispenser still adds a bit of bulk. Would be great to rethink the packaging to make it more travel friendly.   I didn't take before and after pictures to observe a noticeable difference on the firming and lifting benefits but I will absolutely continue to use this product as my primary moisturizer and look forward to seeing additional benefits with continued use.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Extreme Cream twice a day for over a month and I am so impressed with the overall appearance of my skin. The product absorbs quickly and my dry skin feels smooth and hydrated throughout the day. It gives me a noticable glow and I've seen minor texture improvements. It also wears very well under my sunscreen and makeup with no pilling or patchiness. Even though this is a fragrance-free product, there is a slight botanical scent, but it dissipates rather quickly. I've been using the same moisturizer for 5+ years, outside of testing new products, and I ordered two refills of Extreme Cream. I've found my new go-to moisturizer. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic cream with the texture of a much more expensive product. It feels rich yet lightweight and is completely fragrance free. Works beautifully as a night cream in these hot summer months. I saw a noticeable difference in the texture and tone of my skin after 30 days of use. One star off because it claims to be safe for sensitive skin - I do not think it would be a good option for people sensitive to retinoids. My skin just barely tolerated the retinoid strength and I have medium-sensitive skin. This was provided to me for review, but I will be repurchasing when I run out!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free and am leaving this review after trying the product for 21 days. (My intention was to try it for a full 28, but I dropped the bottle on my bathroom floor, and the top entirely broke making it unfeasible for me to pack it for a two-week trip.)  The first thing you notice when you open the product is the smell. For me, it smelled like sunscreen. Itu2019s not a deal breaker, but as someone who uses sunscreen that does not have a strong smell, it did put me off a bit. I really love the packaging, but for the size of the bottle, you donu2019t get that much cream. Butttt, it is refillable, which is a really nice touch. The pump was a little finicky, however, and required me to push down a few times for cream to come out. That aside, the texture is lovely, and it goes on nicely. Unfortunately, however, I didnu2019t really notice a difference in my skin between me using this product and my prior moisturizer by Tower 28. I felt like it did make my skin look a bit oily/shiny throughout the day. I was a bit disappointed too because I really wanted to love this product, but early on in the testing period, my neck started developing a rash from this product. I then switched back to Tower 28u2019s moisturizer on my neck and Extreme Cream on my face, but as someone who has a basic skincare routine, I didnu2019t love having to use two different moisturizers to cover my neck and face, and I had to be careful not to get any of the Extreme Cream on my neck after putting on it and my sunscreen. The unfortunate thing is that I also really wanted to try the product because of tech lines on my neck, but I couldnu2019t use it in the end for that purpose!  All in all, I think it has the potential to be a great product for someone else, but it wasnu2019t a winner in my book, and while I may still use the broken bottle when I get home, I likely wonu2019t be refilling the bottle in the future.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: If you like a glossy glow, buy this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!  I tested the iNNBEAUTY PROJECT Extreme Cream for a month as part of the Gloss Angeles Confidential program.  I was excited to get my hands on this cream as I had heard excellent things in the skincare influencer community.  It did not disappoint.  The cream has a rich reverse emollient texture that leaves the skin hydrated and glowy.  For two out of the four weeks that I tested the cream I was living in an arid mountain climate that typically leaves my skin feeling dry and irritated.  Extreme Cream was the ideal antidote.  My skin drank up the cream and felt hydrated throughout my vacation.  Back at home, I found that I preferred the cream at night as my final skincare routine step.  In the morning, I typically jump from all of my serums straight to a moisturizing SPF during the summer.  I found when using the Extreme Cream between serums and SPF in the a.m., that my skin was too glossy and my makeup was more likely to slide off of my face.  If you have normal to oily skin, then I would recommend this as a night cream as opposed to both a day and night cream in the summer.  That being said, it was great for me day and night in the mountains and I bet I'd like it in winter mornings too.  It does leave skin glossy/glowy, which I personally love, but might not be an oily girl's favorite.  The consistency and finish remind me of Augustinus Bader's The Rich Cream or UBeauty's Super Hydrator.  At this price point, I'd pick Extreme Cream over either alternative every day of the week!  I did not notice any lifting with this cream, but I don't honestly think that any cream can lift the skin.  I did love the texture and tone of my skin using this and loved that I could layer it over tretinoin, AHAs, Vitamin C without any irritation.  I definitely think the cream is worth checking out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here are my thoughts after testing this product for a month:   For reference my skin type is combo, shiny in the t-zone and I have rosacea type 2 where I experience bumps on my cheeks. I have a few fine lines at 37 years old and I have noticed some volume loss and less defined jawline so I was excited by some of the claims the company makes about u201cliftingu201d.   First impression: I was a little put off by the scent. I avoid essential oils and fragranced skin care because of my rosacea. There is no added fragrance or essential oils in the ingredient list so I believe the scent comes from one of the ingredients. It did not end up aggravating my rosacea and the scent does not linger.   I was worried this cream would be too heavy and rich for my combo skin but I was pleasantly surprised by the texture. It absorbed beautifully and felt like a great balance between feeling lightweight but providing enough moisture and hydration. I have noticed more balanced hydration in my skin and less oily shine throughout the day.   It wears really great under makeup which is a huge win for me as I struggle to find something that pairs well with my rosacea RX and sunscreen.   Overall I really enjoyed testing this product and will definitely repurchase a refill. I did not experience noticeable u201cliftingu201d but did not expect to after only a month of use. I am anxious to continue to use to hopefully get those results in time.   One thing I think could use room for improvement is the packaging. It is aesthetically pleasing but the size is a bit deceiving. For travel I was able to unscrew the glass vessel that reveals the slimmer, inner tube but the cap was still chunky and took up space in my carry on toiletry bag. I like the idea of the refill but I think there could be adjustments in the design.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity

reviews.review_title: luxurious & effective. a new staple in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this moisturizer has a whipped texture and is such a treat to applyu2014 it just melted into my skin. itu2019s very hydrating but not too heavy for the summer months. i used this for 30 days in a row and around day 4 i started experiencing some dry patches on my neck oddly, so i stopped applying it there but continued on my face. eventually i went back to applying on my neck and chest and it was fine. i think my skin just needed a second to get used to the bio retinol ingredient. i wore it daily in california dry weather and northeast humidity; it was great either way. it wore great as a base under both makeup and spf. i didnu2019t love how cumbersome and heavy the bottle was, considering how small the pump and actual product tube was. but i bought this for my 65 yr old mom too because she fell in love with it when she tried mine. overall i would recommend this product to anyone! thank you gloss angeles confidential for this opportunity.

reviews.review_title: A Face Cream I Can Use Year-Round
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for over a month, I've been pleased to see my skin go from patchy and dry to luminous, clear, and smooth. It has been my go to face cream for day and night, and I was really impressed with how it helped with decreasing the overall appearance of fine lines and even some dark spots. Though it's a moisturizer I could see myself using in winter, I found it was lightweight enough to use during the hottest summer days, too. It didn't pill under makeup or my SPF at all. My skin was also hydrated enough with just the face cream that I managed to leave other hydrating serums behind while traveling. It's a solid moisturizer and now a main staple in my routine that I look forward to replenishing since it also has refillable packaging. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful moisturizer at a Great Price!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is really a 4.5 star review. I was so excited to have the opportunity to test this cream after seeing so many amazing reviews! Earlier in the year, I had bad contact dermatitis, something I had never had before. Due to that, I switched all of my skin care to Vanicream and have been using it ever since, mostly because I needed to finish the jar, but I was also just content using it since there wasn't really another moisturizer I was in love with. My skin has been through a lot with the dermatitis, and then I found out I was pregnant! My skin became pretty dry and dehydrated as a result, and I went through the process of figuring out what to use. I'm also acne prone so it was new territory as someone with usually combo/oily skin. Enter Extreme Cream. It was the first moisturizer I introduced to my skin after Vanicream (Note: My OB did say it was okay since bio-retinol isn't true vitamin A), and my skin instantly loved it. The reverse emulsion feels amazing, and it makes my skin have the prettiest glow. At night I use 4 pumps for face and neck, and in the morning I use two since I layer it under sunscreen. My skin never broke out from this, and I wake up in the morning with plump, dewy skin!! There is a slight santal-like smell for me, but it doesn't bother me at all, and it doesn't linger. I do think the texture of this cream makes it more of a summer cream. On days that I was really dry I had to layer my Vanicream over it to feel really sealed in, but most nights, it's fine on it's own. Since I have dry skin, I will probably either switch to something else in the winter or just layer this since it feels so nice! Another thing I don't particularly like is how heavy the bottle is. The packaging is beautiful, but I traveled with the cream and found that I didn't like it too much since it was so large and heavy. Those are minor things though. I do see this as a future repurchase and highly rec to all!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this after hearing so many people rave about this moisturizer. I have combo, oily skin that can become easily congested so I tend to stick to lighter formulations, especially in the warmer weather since I love where it gets hot and humid during the summer months. After testing this for a little over 4 weeks I was incredibly impressed on how hydrating this was without feeling like grease on my face. I would say that while I tested this morning and night per my instructions I would recommend for skin that tends to be oily to use only at night, and possibly night and morning during the colder months. I did notice when I woke up in the morning that my skin felt plump and moisturized without being sticky but some days it felt a little too heavy. It worked well with my other skincare in the morning and evening and meshed well with both makeup and sunscreen. I did notice a bit more congestion in my chin, but that could also be attributed to the warmer weather and I can't say it was from the moisturizer 100%. Overall, my skin looks a little more even in tone and smoother than when I started and this is the only step in my routine that changed. The smell for me wasn't unpleasant, but it does smell like its ingredients so if you don't care for fragranced skincare this might be a bonus for you. The packaging is beautiful, with a glass bottle that houses the refillable tube but it is very fragile so it is best to keep in a cabinet and not part of a travel regimen. I can confidently say this is something I can see myself purchasing a refill of, especially during the colder months.    Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this product for over a month and my acne prone skin loved it. I'm pretty picky when it comes to moisturizers, using on Dieux and La Roche Posay for the last 4 years. To me, the extreme cream has a neutral scent and wears really well under sunscreen and makeup. I didn't notice any improvements in my skin, but it did keep it hydrated in the dry climate I live in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for over a month and my face feels truly moisturized- like lasting through the day moisturized. My skin typically feels dehydrated mid day and my makeup looks dull. Lately my skin has been Glowing and looks so smooth and radiant Iu2019m barely wearing makeup, if at all. It feels rich when putting it on, but Iu2019ve had zero issue with pulling or layering with other products.  I canu2019t put my finger on whatu2019s changed, but my skin is refined - I feel like tone is more consistent ?less redness in my t zone), pores are small, everything looks tight and radiant. I canu2019t comment on wrinkle reduction per se, but the total appearance overall is a 10. Iu2019d definitely repurchase.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a highly hyped cream and I would say it lives up to some of its claims. The cream is a lovely texture with a light smell (even though itu2019s technically fragrance free) and spreads really well. It leaves a gorgeous dewy finish. However, I would not say this is the most hydrating cream. Even with normal skin in the summer, I felt like I needed an additional hydrating cream underneath or an occlusive on top. So, I personally wouldnu2019t expect this to be an all duty cream. Additionally, the packaging is extremely bulky and heavy and not great for travel vs other 1.7oz creams.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin drank this up and left it glowing. Itu2019s feels and smells wonderful. I wear it during the day under my foundation and makeup then once more at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved testing this product over the past 4+ weeks (2x/day) and will be purchasing it again. I have always disliked moisturizers, which only seemed to leave a filmy cream on the surface of my skin.  This one is so different, and really absorbs, leaving my face all glowy, and looking and feeling nourished.  I'm not wild about the size of the packaging - it is larger and taller than other 1.7 oz. containers, but it is pretty, and refillable, which I appreciate. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this morning and night for a little over 4 weeks and really liked it! It plays well under makeup and sunscreen. My face is SUPER glowy when I first apply it, which had me a little worried that my skin would feel greasy throughout the day. However, it absorbed quickly while still keeping my skin fresh and hydrated all day. I didn't have high expectations for the claims about reducing wrinkles and fine lines; however, I do notice a small reduction in the depth of my smile lines. I didn't notice makeup settling into those lines as much while I was using the cream.   About halfway through testing this, I broke out really badly. I'm still not sure if it had to do with the cream or with stress, but I almost never have breakouts so it did stick out to me.   I like the texture and results of the cream and would recommend it overall. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Impactful & cost effective for a non-beauty girlie
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 52, not a beauty girlie. I've never thought about skincare before, until perimenopause/menopause. I'm super simple, only want the essential, the most cost effective, with the greatest amount of impact - this product fits the bill! I've now been using it consistently for over a month and I love it.   My skin SUCKED IT UP! It felt perfect, nothing too heavy, I barely felt it on my face  I had a teeny tiny bit of peeling around 1 of my nostrils, and on one side of my neck for a day at the start. For the first week or so I experienced some spiciness but nothing for too long or concerning.    The past few years my skin has felt tight, dry and I was always conscious of it - now I don't! I don't think about my face!    Overall my entire face is looking and feeling much more nourished and healthy than it has in a long time and this is the only product that I'm using on it. I could go all in on this one product and call it a day.   Works well with sunscreen and have had no issues under make-up.  My skin feels the most hydrated it has felt in years - no exaggeration.   I feel my skin's elasticity has increased, and I see a decrease in wrinkle length around my mouth area.   The only thing I'm not too keen on is the giant glass bottle it comes in. It's heavy and not easy to travel with although beautiful and classy.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product had a nice barely there scent (not sure it would be considered fragrance free), was a rich viscosity, and worn beautifully under my tinted moisturizer w/ spf and other makeup. The packaging is a pleasant weight and I like that it's refillable, though with the components, it's tough to know how much is remaining. I've been using this consistently, AM and PM, for the past 5-6 weeks and I'm not sure I notice an alarmingly obvious difference in my skin, but I am also someone who typically does not have a lot of dermatological issues and don't really notice smaller changes with the skin on my face. Uunfortunately, I forgot to snap a before photo or keep track with weekly photos to document  Overall, I do think it was very moisturizing and I will continue using it until it's gone, although I might switch off with a thinner moisturizer for the AM for the absorption speed when I'm in a rush getting ready in the morning. I'll be saving the bottle and considering repurchase in the future when I'm through with my existing collection of skincare.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Extreme Cream in the morning and night every day for almost 5 weeks. My millennial skin type is combination and sensitive. My first impression of Extreme Cream was quite positive. I really like the texture and how it feels on my skin. It doesn't feel greasy for how rich and nourishing it is. I did not experience any peeling as others mentioned. I also didn't notice or mind the smell if there was any at all. It wore well under makeup, both powder based as well as liquid foundation. I also felt it performed great under SPF, this being in 117u00b0 heat. I do feel like it smoothed my skin and made my lines and wrinkles less prominent which I didn't have high expectations for so that was a pleasant surprise. From the beginning it did cause me to breakout and although they seemed to lessen as I used it more, I am still breaking out some unfortunately. I really do love how it feels on my skin but I'm undecided if I will purchase a refill due to the breakouts I get. I definitely think it's worth it to try and see if it agrees with you skin. I think elder millennials and Gen X would benefit most from this moisturizer. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through participation in Gloss Angeles Confidential to review.  I was surprised on the large size  & the ability to buy a refill especially for the price.  I experienced some mild spiciness after use. It didnu2019t cause any redness & I found that using a face oil after use help to dissipate the sensation. This step wasnu2019t needed after the 2nd week after my skin became tolerant.  My skin soaked up the cream really well. Typically this time of year, I do prefer a slightly lighter moisturizer, but my skin never felt oily or greasy.  Worked well under makeup as well. I did notice improved hydration & plumpness. Overall, the spicy experience was worth the noticeable changes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested iNNBEAUTY Extreme Cream for 4 weeks, using 2x daily. At night, I only used with my toner and during the day I applied before SPF. I liked the texture; it is medium-weight, not a heavy cream but thicker than a normal moisturizer lotion. The product scent was fairly neutral (smelled like raw ingredients) and I prefer fragrance-free for any potential irritation. Extreme cream spreads on easily and leaves a layer on your skin that you can feel, but yet is not tacky. I noticed that products layered on top of the cream applied more easily and less could be used. I took a photo at the beginning of testing and after 4 weeks and I can see that the lines around my mouth look plumper!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! It has a great subtle glow to it, mixed seamlessly into my daytime and nighttime routine, and wore amazing under SPF and/or make up! My skin is smoother, happier, firmer, and bouncier, which is great as Iu2019m slowly creeping toward 40 Iu2019m seeing more and more signs of aging. I will be buying again for sure. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this cream and have been testing it over the past month, using it in addition to my regular skincare routine  (misc serums, Tretinoin, etc.) both morning and night. At first, I was skeptical about how it would stack up against some of the more pricey creams I have tried in the past. I was pleasantly surprised to see that it 100% stacks up!  The cream is luxe and rich yet it absorbs into my skin beautifully.  It plays well with my other skincare products and leaves my skin hydrated and glowing -- both immediately after use as well as the following morning.  The packaging is very substantial and I love that it is refillable (helping both my wallet and the environment). Extreme Cream is focused on anti-aging and while I don't know that I saw firming and lifting miracles happen after this past month's use, I definitely feel that, over time, this will be a great part of my skincare arsenal to target my areas of concern. I'm adding this to my Sephora Loves immediately and can't wait to try other products from the line.

reviews.review_title: Game changer for tired, dull skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a working mom with 2 toddlers, I wanted to try a cream that could multitask and withstand the whole day. Wears well under makeup and SPF. My face and decolletage are brighter. Fine lines on forehead are much less visible. Highly recommend!  and fine line

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For context I am 40, I have dry/sensitive skin, I live in a dry climate, and I do not use vitamin C or retinol.   For me three-four pumps worked nicely and lasted 4 weeks (using both AM and PM) before it emptied. There is an instant feeling of hydration and plumpness which is nice. The cream absorbs nicely and easily slid into my routine.  Itu2019s summer time and this wasnu2019t too overpowering or heavy for me. The smell reminds me of crayons but itu2019s not overpowering.   Iu2019m deducting one star because of the packaging. The outer bottle is large and heavy and seems a bit excessive. Iu2019d like something smaller or more product. Also I donu2019t understand the sustainability aspect. Putting a jar into another jar doesnu2019t make sense to me. Whatu2019s the purpose of the outer jar then? Itu2019s seems like a waste.  With that said, I would definitely consider repurchasing because the clinicals are impressive. I donu2019t have sagging YET but I know itu2019s coming. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Luxury cream at an affordable price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so incredibly pleased with this moisturizer! Itu2019s so silky and blends in beautifully over serums and works so well under makeup and sunscreen. Not too thick and not too thin, think it could be good for most seasons. I didnu2019t feel like the scent was strong enough to make a note of, and the packing is nice and heavy - love the refill concept and sustainability. I used the product for 8 weeks on my neck and chest (because i was having active breakouts on my chin and using a benzoyl peroxide product) and have seen a difference in hydration and general fine lines. I will continue using this product and will likely refill!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer!   I have been using this for the past month in the morning and evening and can see a difference in the overall hydration and smoothness of my skin but also a bit of firming and lifting.  I am in my 50's so firming and lifting is something I am interested in!   I have been looking for a product that would deliver on its claims and this one does.   The firming and lifting is subtle but I am hoping with continued use that I will see even more benefit.  I love that the product is refillable too.   I didn't notice any scent and it paired well with my SPF in the morning,  I will definitely be repurchasing!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product morning and night for the past month. I have seen a reduction in lines and some firming around my jaw line. My skin soaks up moisturizer and has always been dry, so I did start adding a thicker   moisturizer at night. I love that there is no fragrance. The texture is really nice, unlike most moisturizers Iu2019ve used before. The pump is great, but need something more travel friendly in the future. I do plan on purchasing the refill!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful moisturizer. It layers well and plays well with all of my other skincare. I did not experience any pilling when applying spf over it. I use Tretinoin 3x/week and it really helped with the dry patches I sometimes experience from it.  The texture is lovely- it is rich, but not greasy. It was a pleasure to use day and night.  The only negative is in the month I have been using it, I broke out 4 times- which is unusual for me. Itu2019s July and where I live is very hot and humid this time of year. Maybe this moisturizer is too heavy for me to use in the summer. I will definitely pick it up again in the winter when my skin really needs hydration.  I didnu2019t notice any plumping or lifting from this moisturizer, just immediate hydration.  I highly recommend this product for those with very dry skin. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is combination but tends to be more on the dry side. With first application, I could definitely notice a difference with hydration and a nice healthy, glow. I used this how I normally use a moisturizer and proceeded with make up on top. Make up applied nicely - no pilling or slipping.  Overall, for hydration, this was nice and my skin looked and felt healthy. I did not notice a drastic different with lifting/firming. My only other con is the size of the packaging, itu2019s really large which makes it difficult to travel with.   I received this as part of the Gloss Angeles review program.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product! I tested for roughly about ~1 month (June 12 - July 11th). I started off using only at night and then pivoted to twice daily (AM&PM). This paired really well with my minimal night time routine. Double cleanse, Dr. Idris dark spot treatment, extreme cream as the final step. The texture is so creamy and luxjuriosuly easy to apply. I didnu2019t notice any scent or fragrance associated with it. Every morning my skin felt hydrated, so smooth and plump. When I pivoted to include AM use, this layered VERY well under my sunscreen which was a HUGE win! I cannot stress the importance of wearing sunscreen with this - it makes your skin very glowy and flawless! I kept the morning routine very simple as well to track my results better. This was the sole indicator for me that this product was working. Iu2019ve used retinol serums in the past but this one is in a league of its own. I could not get over how smooth and plump it made my face and neck. One thing that was a little difficult to manage was the packaging, initially I thought my bottle was empty since the pump wasnu2019t pulling out any product. After checking with others, it seemed like the inner pump could become dislodged so it was necessary to check if it was on properly. While this isnu2019t a total dealbreaker, it would be good for the brand to reconsider the packaging on this one. I like the fact that itu2019s refillable but the pump should maybe be a little better quality or should come with an info card on how to check itu2019s properly installed. Overall, I would 100% recommend this if youu2019re looking for an easy way to incorporate a retinol product with a lot of punch behind it. I will definitely be purchasing the refill option!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a little rich for my combo skin in the summer, but I think it will be great in the winter at night. Definitely very moisturizing without causing any breakouts. If you have dry skin, this could be your new best friend. Appreciate that there is no added fragrance, but not thrilled with the glass bottle as itu2019s large, heavy, and the first time it fell onto the floor it shattered. Definitely not travel friendly. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a whole month to get a full idea on the product and it tightened my pores, cleared redness on my cheeks while hydrating my skin. I really loved the texture of cream, it was hydrating but not too thick. I have combination skin and it didnu2019t make my oily areas worse. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this! I have sensitive 35 year old skin and Iu2019m getting lines.  I used this in conjunction with a prescription retinol and the ordinaryu2019s argiriline serum and I saw great results.  I have  a stubborn line above my lip from sleeping on my side thatu2019s faded drastically after a month of use.   It doesnu2019t irritate and is very calming.  The inner bottle arrived unscrewed from the outer reusable casing but it was a quick fix.  I like the refillable casing. I plan to repurchase:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been consistently using the Extreme Cream for four weeks in my morning and evening skin care routine.  It feels so luxurious on my face and neck. The Extreme Cream layers well over my serums and under sunscreen. I had zero issues with peeling or texture when I wore make up over the cream. Itu2019s a fabulous skin care product! I have already purchased a bottle so I donu2019t run out of it.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I have very dry skin, and it moisturizers so well without feeling overly greasy. It also wears very nicely under makeup with no pilling. I use it morning and evening, and my skin has looked much brighter and healthier. I received this to test, but plan to continue using and purchasing on my own. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my mid-20s, struggle with acne, acne scars, and have difficulty keeping my skin hydrated.   I only have tried the product for a month (AM/PM), so the changes Iu2019ve noticed are small but show improvement overall:  - The lifespan of my cystic and hormonal acne seems to be much shorter and fade a lot faster.  - My skin feels moisturized throughout the day and overnight and looks brighter.  - My skinu2019s texture is a lot smoother. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: The Moisturizer That Has Ruined All Others For Me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin: 50+, combination (mostly dry with slightly oily forehead), sensitive, rosacea  I used this moisturizer twice a day for a month u2013 and now it's the high bar all other moisturizers need to live up to. I typically go for non-irritating barrier repair type of facial moisturizers due to my dry, rosacea skin. And I usually need to slather on two generous layers both morning and night, and sometimes an extra layer midday just to keep my skin from feeling dry and tight.   Not with the Extreme Cream! I have been using 2-3 pumps for my face, neck and chest morning and night (a pump is fairly small). It soaks in immediately, leaves a lovely glow that is not sticky or oily to the touch, and lasts all day/night. TBH, it's more expensive than my basic barrier creams, but I use a lot less and can skip a separate peptide serum, so I'm pretty sure I'm winning! This bottle has lasted me over a month, using it twice a day. I use it under sunscreen daily and have had no pilling or application issues.  As far as the lifting and firming claims, I did notice some improvement in my skin. The small wrinkles around my lips are almost completely gone, and I'm seeing a lot more smoothness on my neck and chest where there was more visible sun damage. YMMV u2013 for me, even if there was no firming and lifting results, I'd still keep using it just for the moisturizing benefits.   This product didn't have any scent whatsoever for me, and I like that it's refillable. At first I thought that the chunky glass bottle is too much, too heavy, but now I'm used to it and I like that I can buy a refill (already on order) and keep using the outer bottle and pump. The only packaging negative is that the cap cracked, but it would be too large for me to travel with anyway.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Gloss Angeles for this opportunity!   I have been using the INN Beauty Project Extreme Cream Anti-Aging, Firming, and Lifting Refillable Moisturizer for a month now, and the results have been nothing short of transformative. After struggling with chronically dry skin for several months, this moisturizer has been a game-changer, providing an incredible glow and deep moisture that has left my skin looking uniform and plump.  I applied the cream both day and night, pairing it with a vitamin C serum in the morning and SPF. Throughout the day and even after hours of wear, my skin remained thoroughly moisturizedu2014an impressive feat that rarely happens with other products. This intense hydration has been a blessing, especially for my aging and acne-prone skin.  The only drawback I noticed was the texture of the cream. It felt a little filmy upon application, and I had to ensure my serums were fully dried down before applying the moisturizer. However, this small inconvenience is easily outweighed by the significant benefits.  Overall, the INN Beauty Project Extreme Cream is a fantastic choice for anyone dealing with dry, aging, or acne-prone skin. Its firming and lifting effects, combined with deep hydration, make it a standout product in my skincare routine.
