I think this product is reasonably priced for all of the benefits it touts and will continue to purchase and use it to see if my results continue to improve.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Tried for free, immediately bought the refill
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested out this product for a period of one month, and to be honest, did not expect much. I didn't expect a moisturizer to have much impact on my skin (as opposed to something with a more potent delivery system, like a serum), but I have been enjoying the Innbeauty Project Slushy serum moisturizer so I was optimistic.   My skin is combo/dry, and gets very easily irritated and flaky. My main concerns are texture, evenness of tone, and loss of firmness.   To determine that any change in my skin was from the cream, I was very careful to keep my routine basic while trying this out- just gentle cleanser, hydrating serum (Slushy in the morning, CosRX snail essence at night), Extreme Cream, and mineral SPF during the day.  This product is genuinely such a pleasure to use. I love the texture, which is rich without being heavy. Love that it has a pump, love that it's refillable. I also love that the main component is heavy enough to not topple over as the product empties and gets pushed towards the top, which can happen with airless pumps.   Immediately after using, I saw the glossy glow mentioned on the box. I also noticed that I wasn't having the skin barrier issues I was having before, literally zero flakiness. By the end of the month, I noticed a big improvement in the tone and texture of my skin. As of yet, the effects on sagging haven't been dramatic enough to have me convinced I'm not imagining it, but I feel like my jawline is looking less jowly.   While I received this product free in exchange for my honest review, I ended up loving it so much I purchased a refill before the testing period was over. I'm a big fan, highly recommend, and if you're reading this Innbeauty Project, please make a mini for travel!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating, looks wonderful under makeup!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very luxe feeling moisturizer, at a reasonable price point (especially if you get the refill.) I have dry, somewhat mature skin (I guess!) and live in a dry climate. This kept me moisturized all day, and when I applied it at night I woke up still feeling some hydration as well. This looks SO good under makeup if you want a glowy/dewy finish. Worked great over my serums, under SPF and makeup. It is fragrance free but I did notice a slight scent (maybe sandalwood?) I didnt mind it honestly. It feels like a good high end moisturizer at a lower price point. I used it twice a day for about a month, and it was consistent on my skin the whole time. Only cons I guess are that I did not personally notice any lifting or firming, as the package describes. And I think the bottle is overly large /heavy for what you get. I would suggest just traveling with the refill.  Overall I am a fan of this brand, and I am likely to buy it again. I also love that it's vegan and cruelty free (a must have in 2024, IMO.)   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Must-Have Moisterizer that Does What It Promises!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an incredible moisturizer and does what it promises. The texture is lovely and wears so well under make-up and sunscreen. It's just thick enough, rubs right in, and leaves no oily residue.  After using it for 4 weeks, my face feels firmer & looks snatched, and my skin tone is clearer.  I even got compliments on my skin! The scent is subtle, not overpowering at all. Also the price point is so great for those on a budget but want a product that feels luxurious and does what it says it does.  The only downside is the weight of the bottle and because I travel a lot for work; was kind of a bummer to pack but it wouldnu2019t prevent me from buying the refill because I really love this product! Thank you GlossAngeles Confidential for making me a convert to this brand!

reviews.review_title: A great all-in-one moisturizer and treatment
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a month now and am really enjoying it! Iu2019ve noticed some firming effects and it seems to be helping with texture as well.  Texture - Oddly thick-somewhere between a cream and a paste, but spreads easily and absorbs quickly   Scent - Slightly odd but dissipates quickly/doesnu2019t remain once itu2019s on the skin. I appreciate that itu2019s not overly scented   Feel - Doesnu2019t feel oily/like too much for my combination skin, even under a moisturizing SPF (skin 1004). No pilling under SPF - Makeup applies nicely on top and doesnu2019t slide off by end of day  Packaging (loses a point here)  - Bottle is very heavy and large vs product size  - Iu2019m afraid of breaking the glass outer packaging (though the pump is functional without the glass outer part). Would have to decant for travel  - I understand theyu2019re going for u201cluxeu201d but the weight seems a bit overkill  - The pump is very nice: easy to control how much product you dispense   Efficacy - Does seem to have vitamin a-like activity: causes a little sensitivity/peeling around nose, chin. Had to back off using prescription tretinoin (had been using 0.05% daily and had to reduce to a couple times a week to avoid peeling around nose/chin) - Noticed some skin firming/tightening - Skin feels moisturized throughout the day. I could see this being a bit light for someone who has very dry skin, but itu2019s perfect for my combination skin.  - I noticed similar firming effects to Strivectin Peptight at half the price! - I would definitely repurchase!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for AB level but don't want to pay the $$ get this. The reverse emulsion makes it feel so luxe. I couldn't believe the level of moisture on my skin! So much I feel like I didn't have to do my normal hyaluronic acid before makeup application. The bottle says to use morning and night - that said I think I would only do that in the winter. It was a little too much for hot summer mornings. Although I never had an issue with pilling putting SPF and makeup on top of it. I'm in my 40's and while I never saw the lifted claims in my jawline I do feel like the texture has definitely improved and my skin feels soft and bouncy. For that alone it's worth a repurchase. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try for a review and had high expectations based on other reviews I read.  I tried the lotion out twice a day for over a month. The lotion is luxurious and thick.  While it moisturized my skin, I didn't notice any other changes to my skin. I will use the entire bottle, but I don't see myself actually purchasing this lotion.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great cream but not as moisturizing for my needs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Gloss Angeles Confidential for this testing opportunity!! Iu2019ll say this, the texture of this cream is incredible, and I think under normal circumstances this cream would be hydrating enough for me. Unfortunately, Iu2019ve been having a rough time with my skin and so Iu2019ve been using quite a lot of my prescriptions which is quite drying. This cream is great at first and I get an AMAZING glow but after a few hours Iu2019m left quite dry. Iu2019ll definitely be trying again when my skin is more under control

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my 40's and have combo skin. I've been looking for a moisturizng cream that has active ingredients that doesn't irritate - especially since I have recently started micro-needling treatments at my derm. My PM regimen is pre-cleanse, cleanse, serum or tretinoin, eye cream, Extreme Cream, and then slug.  This moisturizer is the BEST! I wake up every morning with glowy skin.    The cream itself is on the thicker side so you don't have to apply much and they do sell refills so you can save $$ and the planet at the same time.  I will say that I only use this moisturizer at night for now because I tend to be on the oilier side.  However, I look forward to trying this cream during the day during the winter when my skin is more parched.  Looking forward to adding this product as a staple moving forward!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful cream but too powerful for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely powerful moisturizer but too Extreme for my skin.  The texture is so lovely and feels luxurious when applying, like to apply on dry skin better than damp, and it gives the loveliest glow. Plays well with sunscreen and makeup too. The downside is that it is just too active for my skin. I have very sensitive skin and am prone to dermatitis outbreaks and this was certainly a trigger. I tried the recommend night and day application for the first two days and immediately got the dreaded red bumps. Then I pulled back to every night with another moisturizer on top as I was waking up with dry tight skin. That was still too much. Once I started only using it as I would a retinol, a few times a week sandwiched between cream, my skin was happier. When it calmed down the I did notice that my skin looked great!  I was able to apply it to my hands and neck daily and noticed a huge change in skin texture, firmness and dark spots as well. Will probably keep in the routine and use sparingly because I do love the results and feel but guess my skin is just too reactive for consistent use.  Image 1 is with a bit of coverup but you can see what a nice glow it gives  and Image 2 shows the irritation that starts with two days in a row.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and typically use a more lightweight moisturizer. But, as I get older, I have really been looking for a product that would have other benefits besides just hydrating my skin. I found this to be a pretty rich cream, and my skin absolutely loved it! It soaked in very quickly and did not pill under my sunblock or makeup. But best of all, after 4 weeks of use, my forehead wrinkles are diminished in appearance and my skin is glowing! I am amazed and very impressed.  I can be a little sensitive to scent with products, and while this is fragrance-free, it does still have a subtle smell that did not bother me at all. I do wish the packaging was a bit more lightweight. The outer bottle is glass, so it will definitely be easy to recycle (I definitely prefer this to plastic).  Bottom line, I'm definitely going to repurchase. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall - I was pleasantly surprised! I am over 35 and started to see signs of aging increase in the last year. I am not a Retinol user since I have found that my skin can be reactive. I was able to incorporate this into my night time skincare routine and am SUPER happy with the results. Great texture, relatively pleasant smell, and I started to see results within the first 4 weeks! Overall, improved radiance and gave my cheeks a more sculpted look. LOVE that this is refillable and am so happy to recommend this to my Mom (65+)  who wants an all in one, sensitive skin friendly, results driven product!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is the fountain of youth in a bottle and at such a great price point.  I have been using it for over a month and have noticed a lot of positive change to the smoothness and firmness of my face. My face is more lifted and it has reduced the fine lines on my forehead.  This is a one and done product.  I just wash my face and use this product and it does everything that the multiple products I have used in the past.  I also really like that you can buy a refill so it makes less waste.  It also works great under makeup and plays well with my SPF on top.  This is my new holy grail product. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I really enjoyed Extreme Cream! I love the texture and it felt very hydrating and nourishing on the skin throughout the duration of testing (one month). It wears very well under makeup and sunscreen. I don't mind the natural fragrance of the product. After a month, my skin feels plump and firmer than before and I'd be excited to see what improvements I'd notice with longer term use. On this note, after testing this as an oily and acne-prone skin type, I feel I'm most suited to use this product in the fall to spring months and not in the middle of summer. I did not experience congestion or acne, just felt extra extra moisturized which I don't need in the summer. Other than this, I really enjoyed using this product and will likely repurchase in the fall! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice face cream. I like the texture - it comes out thick but feels light when you rub into your skin. It is hydrating and it made my skin feel very smooth. I preferred to used this at night as it made my skin look a bit greasy during the day. I didn't see any firming results, however, I am in my 20s and that is not a main concern of mine.  I have two issues with this product:  1. The smell. I dont know what it smells like but I found it to be unpleasant. It does dissipate quickly though so this really isn't a big issue.  2. THE PACKAGING. I know this is a refillable container, however the package is heavy and bulky. Its so hard to travel with becuase it takes up soo much room in my bag, but I wouldn't decant this into a different container because it might impact the efficacy of the product. It's also glass so I imagine it would break if dropped. It feels luxe but that is not what I look for when purchasing a product.   I liked this product but I will not purchase again because the packaging simply takes up too much space to be convenient in my life/constant travel schedule.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only thing that can truly lift and firm is a facelift. However, looking past the product claims, I truly loved this moisturizer. My skin is smooth and glowing. It absorbs quickly, I appreciate that it is unscented, and it wears well under sunscreen and makeup. I took before and after photos, to be honest there is no noticeable change. I give this moisturizer five stars and highly recommend. My skin loved it, no irritation, no breakouts, just nice skin. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using the extreme cream am & pm for the last 4 weeks, the appearance of my skin is smooth and clear. The extreme cream wears beautifully under sunscreen and makeup. I have sensitive skin and did not experience and sensitivity

reviews.review_title: Potent formula, may be too strong for some
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product to have a potent formula that delivers a luxurious texture and very much absorbs in to the skin. It plays well under sunscreen and makeup. Despite starting out thick, it does not feel too heavy on the skin. It is unscented. Unfortunately I encountered some issues with dry patches and peeling, which prevented me from using it twice daily. Despite this, the component itself felt very high-end, and it was fun to use. I received this product to test through Gloss Angeles Confidential. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What doesn't this stuff do?! I am 42 years old at the time of this review - I am starting to notice a loss of firmness at the jawline, and general lackluster skin - dull, crepey, etc.. This stuff has made a significant difference in the look of my skin - I'm a convert. I also love that I don't have to overthink this product: it has it all - I use it morning and night - in the morning it sits beautifully under my tinted moisturizer with SPF. Thank you Gloss Angeles for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this moisturizer. I have been using it for about five weeks now. I have combination skin, and I am prone to pimples. I do not know if it was related to the moisturizer, but surprisingly I have had no pimples at all in the last 5 weeks, so it did not irritate my skin. I use it twice a day.  It does take a while to u201csink inu201d to the skin, so I do not put sun block or makeup on over it for about 10 minutes after I have applied it.   My skin used to feel tight at the end of the day, and now it feels moisturized in the evening, which I love. It doesnu2019t make my skin feel oily either. I only use moisturizers/cremes that are unscented or have a mild scent, so I love that this product is unscented. I think it has improved the look of fine lines on my forehead, but maybe just because my skin is more moisturized since I replaced my old creme with this one. I did not add any other skin products into my line up while using the moisturizer. Iu2019m going to buy the refill for the moisturizer when this one runs out! I included a couple of pictures in my review- one at night with my old creme on before I started using this, and after I had been using the creme for a month, after it was freshly applied. I think the difference in my forehead fine lines may be too subtle to see in pictures, but I wanted to post u201crealu201d pictures for shoppers to see, and not some silly air-brushed pictures that some companies put in ads.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pro Hydrating, thicker cream that absorbs easily  Light fragrance that isn't overwhelming  Refillable bottle is great for the environment   Con Bottle is very heavy and big for such a small amount of product. (This is technically TSA carry-on approved size) The beautify glossy, glow benefit of this product acted like a  highlighter to my acne and skin impurities. I mainly used this at night and during the day when I could cover it up with makeup.  As for their claim that After 6 weeks users experience visibly increased firmness, increased elasticity, increased facial contour, and decrease in wrinkle length I did not see any change in firmness, elasticity, facial contour or wrinkle length after a month of using this product.    Overall this product was very moisturizing but didn't live up the other  skincare claims. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new EVERYDAY Cream!  I have combo oily skin and I have to be light with how much moisturizer I usually use, my skin just doesn't soak it up.  But This has been amazing.  I have been trying it morning and evening everyday for just over a month.  Works beautifully with my sunscreen and a full 12+ hour days wear of make up and it is soothing with my nighttime routine.  I already have this on renew, I do not want to ever run out.  I love the packaging, feels luxurious, BUT it is heavy and would be difficult to travel with (but I would do it anyway!) Clean scent but not perfumy.  My lines and crinkles seem softer. This cream worked out Great for me.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this moisturizer! After trying it for 30 days, it really helped improve the texture of my skin and seemed to slightly improve fine lines. It's been really hot where I am and even though it's crazy humid, this product seemed to really help balance out my skin. Despite the humidity, my skin was getting really dry from time in the sun, and this product was incredibly soothing and moisturizing.   My only main issue was that the smell wasn't my favorite - not terrible, but kind of a strange thing to have on my face everyday. Aside from that, I will definitely be buying refills of this product!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an unbiased review. I really like this moisturizer! I have sensitive, acne-prone, dehydrated/dry skin that is pretty finicky with most moisturizers, and this didn't cause irritation or acne. Big plus for me there when a lot of actives bother my skin! I'm a mom in my 30s, and I look more tired than I ever have before, and this really has made a difference in the past month to make my skin look glowier and feel more moisturized. I do use prescription tret, and that combo didn't bother my skin using day and night. I didn't notice a scent, and two pumps was plenty to cover my face and neck. However, it is a greasier formula that take a few minutes to dry down.  My first complaint: I do need an extra moisturizer on top to seal it in. I live in a desert climate, so one lighter moisturizer isn't enough. Second complaint: you really need this to soak in before applying anything else on top. It feels like a heavier moisturizer until it dries down, which takes longer than my other moisturizers. However, I've had no issues with SPF or makeup pilling with this underneath. Third: I hate this gigantic packaging! I feel like I can't travel with it because it's just so huge and clunky, and I worry about dropping it.   Even with those complaints, I'm going to rebuy. The fact that I saw results, and it didn't irritate my skin are just too big to overlook! I can work with those few issues to get happier skin.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have really loved using this product. It has a beautiful texture and slip on the face and layers well with makeup. I didnu2019t see a change in my fine lines BUT this is the only product that has stopped my peeling and dry skin from Tretinoin!  It has a slight scent of scent less sunblock almost. When using at first, I did experience a bit of spiciness around my eyes, but no visible irritation. I have already purchased a second bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for a hero product that can do it all - and cut down on my skin prep routine. I was hoping that the Extreme Cream would be that rockstar moisturizer for me.  And it mostly is! Living in the Lowcountry with combination skin, it wasn't perfect for my morning routine.  I found the cream was too thick and I preferred my lightweight gel moisturizers.  However, as a night cream, I am in love. I feel it gives an incredible amount of hydration and leaves my skin looking plumped the next morning.  I also feel that it has helped with some fine lines, too.  Looking forward to using this year round and am certain that it was continue to be a staple night cream for me.  Thank you to Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is light, non comedogenic, and versatile.  I have been using it twice daily for over a month.  In AM I use it over my vitamin C and under SPF-no pilling or heavy feeling, Makeup sits over it nicely.  No scent or irritated skin but skin is hydrated.  In PM I just it over retinol and my eye cream.  Rarely do I have to use a thicker moisturizer over it- only if I have been going hard on a peel or retinol once in a while.  I have been complimented on my complexion this month.  I think the price for quality of product is great.  Apparently, it is refillable, too.  I would definitely recommend this product.  The bottle is a heavy glass-not easy to travel with but very luxe to use on your vanity.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity to review this product!

reviews.review_title: Leaves you looking very dewy and glowing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start off I think this is a great product but I don't think it was a great one for me at least not at the beginning. I have sensitive skin and had a terrible breakout when I initially started using this product morning and night as directed. I switched over to nighttime use only and didn't experience much discomfort after that. Overall the Extreme cream left me feeling moisturized and glowing and I did notice a difference in my overall texture and the firmness of my skin after consistently using it for 4 weeks. If you're able to I would definitely recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free tester. Normally I do a ton of research on products before I purchase, but since this was free, I just said ok letu2019s go! It has ceramides AP, EOP and NP along with several peptides. The ceramides are pretty high on the list of ingredients which is awesome. Normally they get stuck at the bottom and thereu2019s probably very little in the product. I have no idea if the peptides or bio-retinol are sensitizing because I never experienced any irritation. I just tried Stratiau2019s morning moisturizer and Iu2019m pretty sure it made my neck break out, so I was wary of trying this one. However, it was easy to integrate into my routine. It felt moisturizing but not overly so, so I could still use my Instant Angel over top of it at night. I used it under 3 different sunscreens (Anessa, Beauty of Joseon and Skin1004) and they all perfectly layered over it without issue. The one thing I did notice is whatever serum I used before needed to dry down otherwise the moisturizer began to slip around on my face, like it has those tiny water beads that burst, but that wasnu2019t intended. Iu2019m attaching my before and after pics - I canu2019t really see much of a difference although I do think my skin looks more radiant. The before pic was from June and the after pic is a month later in July, so my face should be tanner and it does look lighter and brighter. I am 38, live in a humidish climate on the west coast (PNW) and my main concerns are mostly preventing wrinkles and keeping my face hydrated. I have normal to dry skin, never flaky dry. I also have congested skin, blackheads on my chin and nose. One thing to note is that the bottle is HUGE but the container of product is normal sized. Itu2019s meant to be refilled. Something to keep in mind if you travel a lot. Itu2019s heavy and glass and clunky. Honestly it is my least favorite aspect of the product. However, this was a really nice moisturizer! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Love the product, but one little thing....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I love the texture of this cream! It is super light, extremely hydrating, and gives a nice glow. I work from home and typically run errands with no makeup. I just put this on before I leave and don't feel as blah as I normally would.  There was no noticeable scent to me and it wore well under makeup and SPF, even in the TX heat.    When I started using the cream, I had some light peeling around my nose. Nothing crazy and not the dry peeling you get with RX Tretinoin. That went away after a few days. I didn't have any other issues for about 3 weeks. I went on vacation and I did experience some very small zit clusters on my forehead and one larger one on my left cheek. I DO NOT break out. This was frustrating and the only reason I gave the product 4 stars instead of 5.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using the face cream from InnBeauty Project and saw great results. My skin feels noticeably brighter and superbly moisturized after incorporating this product into my daily skincare routine. The experience of using the cream was great. Its lightweight texture absorbed effortlessly into my skin without leaving any greasy residue, which made it perfect for both daytime and nighttime use. I particularly appreciated how well it wore under makeup and SPF, providing a smooth base without compromising their effectiveness. The subtle, pleasant scent added to the overall experience without being overpowering, contributing to a soothing sensation during application. I used the cream consistently for over four weeks, and during this time, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's hydration levels and overall radiance. While I loved the product overall, there are a few aspects that could be improved upon. For instance, I found the packaging a bit bulky for travel, which may not be convenient for everyone. Additionally, while the cream worked exceptionally well for me, individuals with extremely sensitive skin might want to test a sample first due to the added fragrance.  Overall, I am genuinely impressed with the InnBeauty Project face cream and would highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their skincare routine with a product that delivers visible results. Its effective moisturizing properties and compatibility with makeup and sunscreen make it a versatile option for daily use.  Thank you to Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was not a good fit for my dry, sensitive skin. I was so excited to try this, but noticed redness almost instantly after first use. With continued use, I experienced redness, warmth, and small bumps. It wasnu2019t a severe allergic reaction, but my skin was clearly irritated. I didnu2019t like the way my skin looked after using this product. I reviewed the ingredients prior to testing and didnu2019t see anything Iu2019ve had issues with in the past.   On a positive note, it did not have a noticeable smell and it was hydrating. Wish I could have kept trying. I think this is a good product with a lot of potential, but I would recommend skipping if you have sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: Really great moisturizer for great price!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product for testing so firstly- Thank You Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity! After using this product AM &PM for a full month, I have to admit, it's pretty great (if I could give it 4.5 starts that would be more accurate)! This product definitely makes a lot of claims and while I can't really speak to how much it improved the contours of my face (hence -.5 stars) I can say that it left my skin incredibly moisturized with zero heaviness and overall seemed to make my skin smoother, more even toned, and yes more glowy. The texture of this is unique. It's not heavy at all but still lush when you first apply and then it almost just feels wet. So you may need to tinker a bit with giving it some time to set before moving on to sunscreen, makeup, etc. Once you sort that out it layers beautifully with whatever else you're using over it. You also may find you don't need as many other products with this. For ex. if you're using a separate peptide serum, this should do the trick. I also found this to work well with my retinal in the PM but also think it works great as a solo night cream. Perhaps most importantly I had zero issues with breakouts, clogged pores, or irritation of any kind with this product. For the cost, this is kind of huge steal! It feels and preforms just as well as products 2x the price. Plus I only need 2 pumps for my whole face and neck so cost per use for this is insane imo. If you are someone looking for a product to help with overall tone/texture/fine lines that isn't heavy or irritating this is a SOLID bet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. I tested this product AM & PM for at least 30 days (as requested). Iu2019ll start with the negatives since there arenu2019t many. The cream is a little too rich for me to use twice a day. When I first started using this product my skin was unusually dry and nothing I tried helped, but this cream definitely brought my skin back to life. However, my skin is usually oily and now that weu2019re deep in the Texas summer, twice a day was just too much for me. Going forward, I will only use this cream at night & reevaluate when winter comes. Since the formula is rich, it was a bit tricky figuring out how many pumps I needed. Depending on the condition of my skin, I need 1.5-2.5 pumps. And lastly, the bottle is heavy & glass. That is a positive in its own right, but since I travel a lot for work, it can be a hindrance. Now to the positives. WOW my skin has seriously never looked better, this cream is stunning. Compliments galore on my skin! In the morning, I wore only the cream topped with SPF. I tried multiple SPFs and all worked out well over the cream. It also wears beautifully under makeup. At night, I sometimes used alone and other times with my other products. I found that layering it with other products was a little too much for me since I am naturally very oily. This is great news for me cause it means itu2019s a perfect one stop shop for my skin. If you do not have the time or simply donu2019t want to spend the time with 5+ step routines, I think this moisturizer is a wonderful option. In general, I tend to use what my skin needs on a day by day basis, instead of a set routine (and I just love trying products) but I could see this being the only product I use, especially when Iu2019m traveling and donu2019t want to pack too much. I truly enjoyed this product and Iu2019m glad it lives up to the hype it receives. I already purchased a refill for myself and another bottle to gift my mom. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this product for over 4 weeks, i have combo skin, and live in a very humid Atlanta, Ga. First, product packaging is beautiful. Feels very nice and I love the option to purchase a refill for a discounted price. The glass bottle is quite heavy and I Did drop the bottle and crack the cap, and the pump is quite tiny and because it is also shiny if I had product on my hands it could be slippery.   But the product is so nice!!!! It comes out feeling heavy but once rubbed into my skin it didnu2019t feel heavy at all! My skin drank this up! If I was running a fan at night I would need to apply an additional moisturizer because I would wake up a bit dry but during the day I had ZERO problems applying this under my make up, no piling at all! I use Haus Labs foundation and concealer. They worked great together. I could see the glow after applying and my forehead that is typically dry has not been dry at all! There are no perfumes which I love! I only give this 4 stars for the packaging. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!!

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past month, I am very happy with the results. I have dry, sensitive skin, and I always struggle with finding the perfect moisturizer.  This has been so hydrating without being too heavy. I love the texture of the product and how well it blends into the skin, especially at night (no moisturizer on my silk pillowcase, just on my face). It also pairs nicely with all of my other skincare products (and I do a full routine morning and night), and it also looks lovely under makeup. I have worn this both day and night, but currently think that it is a bit too much for the extreme heat and humidity during the day, so I am currently just using it at night (and will use it during the day come fall).  If you have more oil in your skin, I would start with just a small amount.  I find I only need one pump to fully moisturize my face, which means this product is going to last a long time.  I did not expect to actually see any results beyond hydration, but I find that my skin is a bit more even in tone, is glowing and I also feel like my laugh lines have softened/blurred a bit.  I find that this followed up with tinted sunscreen is the perfect glow during the day, especially for those no-makeup days. I love that the product is refillable, but I do wish that it wasn't so large/heavy given that it is only 1.7 ounces.  I'd love a smaller package option for travel.  That said, I will be buying refills and am excited to have this in my routine. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream for a month and am thoroughly impressed with the results. Right from the start, I loved its texture and how smoothly it applied and absorbed into my skin. My complexion looks so refreshed after application, giving me a stunning glass skin appearance. Comparing my before and after photos, I noticed a surprising improvement in my jawline! It also layers beautifully under my SPF and makeup. My only wish is for a tinted or SPF version to streamline my routine. Thank you, Gloss Angeles Confidential, for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer--it's a new staple for me. The texture feels almost tacky initially but spreads super nicely when applied, and absorbs quickly. It gives an instant glow and I have noticed some firming over time after using it for about a month. This will be my go-to moisturizer for 3 seasons out of the year (I'm not sure it will be moisturizing enough for winter). I love it so much and feel it's a good value--will purchase refills moving forward!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A Must-Have in my Summer Skincare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am always immediately skeptical of creams that claim to be anti-aging or firming because (as an elder millennial) I am just now figuring out my aging skin and many of the *miracle* products havenu2019t really done much to change the look or feel of my skin. After having read several reviews of Extreme Cream, I figured I would give it a go and see if it helped with some of my concerns with fine lines and would help firm up my skin. Thank goodness I did!   In trying Extreme Cream, I LOVE the packaging. I love that itu2019s refillable. The one downside to the packaging is that it is difficult to tell how much product is left in the bottle.  I also love that there is no discernible scent. The cream itself is lightweight and smooth. I used this cream for weeks and put it to the test AM and PM and never once did I feel like the cream was too heavy or greasy. It layered nicely with spf, serums, makeup. My skin always drank it up. In fact, I feel like the addition of this cream under makeup helped to improve the visible texture of my skin. My skin looks so much more smooth with this in my rotation. I also noticed that after 4 weeks of using this cream, my skin really does feel more firm and tight. I used two pumps on my face, neck, and decolletage and noticed results after the first week or so using it twice a day. I will definitely be refilling my Extreme Cream once I run out. This is now in my regular skincare routine and I am so glad I found this product!   Thank you, Gloss Angeles Confidential, for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A new must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a month just finished it up & will be purchasing the refill.  Such a wonderful moisturizer,  I found it to leave me mositurized all day not too glowy or greasy goes on beautifully under makeup & sunscreen no issues with pilling whatsoever.  Evening use with Tretenonin no problems & usually I wake up dry but not with this Extreme Cream I awoke not dewy but definitely not dry like I usually do.  I  feel that I definitely see some firmness in cheeks & neck area.    I was so pleasantly surprised & will definitely purchase the refill & looking forward to trying other products from this brand.  I thoroughly enjoyed this product.  Well done Innbeauty Project fabulous moisturizer.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

The only downside is the packaging is a bit heavy but besides that itu2019s an amazing product especially for the price. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a 10/10. The reverse emulsion makes the texture so smooth and silky when you put it on- and you get an immediate, hydrated glow that isnu2019t shiny. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Obsessed with this cream, I've already purchased a refill! And I purchased a bottle for my Mom!  I had the opportunity to test this product and was immediately impressed with both the experience and the performance. I'm a dry skin girlie and my skin fell in love the reverse-emulsion formula. My skin appears plumper and I have noticed less pronounced fine lines. And the price point..a major win!  My only complaint is the packaging..it's just a little much. I prefer something a little more streamline that I can easily travel with.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity to try this wonderful product! I am an Extreme Cream convert!!

reviews.review_title: Right price for smooth skin in the wrong package
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After 5 weeks of using this cream as my AM and PM moisturizer, I noticed improvements in my skin texture and overall appearance of my skin. I found the cream to melt into my skin on application which felt luxurious. I had no issues using this product with any of my others (Vit C, SPF, tret) and found it was a great base for make up! The one thing I dislike about this product is the packaging - itu2019s large, heavy, and clunky, which makes it a liability near a tile floor and would prevent this product from ever traveling with me via plane. At 1.7oz it would be nice to already be in u201ctravel sizedu201d packaging. Otherwise for the price point this is a great moisturizer, one I am likely to repurchase!   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review. I adore reverse-emulsion formulas, this one went on creamy and as you rub it in gave a bursting of hydration effect that I loved. I wore this under makeup and it acts as a great primer and in my night time routine.  I have pretty reactive skin so initial I loved it, especially since it has bio-retinol and ceramides but over time I experienced breakouts which resulted in me only using this on my next and chest.   I think is a great product for those who have normal and combo skin especially if you are looking for anti-aging benefits, so 30+  If you have oily, acne-prone or sensitive skin I would be be cautious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before starting my review, letu2019s get into my demographic  and skin type.  Age: early 30s.  Skin type: oily combo. Need to have light moisture in the day and heavier moisture in the evening.  Skin Concern: acne prone, pigmentation from acne, and fine lines (smile and decolletage). With that being said, letu2019s go over my thoughts on this product! The texture feels light, but not light in a gel way. It a texture Iu2019ve never felt before. Itu2019s not a heavy feeling rich creme. But itu2019s not a light gel. Itu2019s something in between that I canu2019t quite describe. I found it to be the right moisture for me in the day time. But I felt my skin wanting more at night. This could be due to the fact I use a hydrating SPF during the day(which, btw it layered really well under my SPF and makeup). However, I use this because of the results. Keep in mind I use many type of actives, so I like to think my skin is resilient. I didnu2019t feel any irritation while using this, and my acne did not flare up. I mainly saw the best results in my decolletage. I believe with continued use I will see my skin firm around my jaw line. Iu2019ve been using this product for roughly a month. If your skin sounds like mine, you may need additional products to fine the moisture your skin needs. But all in all, itu2019s a great product with great actives. I will continue to use!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did enjoy this moisturizer quite a bit. I have extremely dry skin, despite the change in seasons, and this made my skin visibly glow like no other moisturizer I have ever used. It was very nourishing, not too thick or sticky  and unscented. It laid beautifully under makeup and gave me a more glowing from within look. Also of note it was the perfect ethereal dewy glow, not a sweaty wet post gym glow. It didnu2019t burn or tingle upon or after application, and I do feel like after a month of testing my skin is firmer. My only qualm with this moisturizer is that I believe it caused me to break out on my cheek. I rarely struggle with breakouts, and only ever on my jaw and chin, so that was definitely a downside. This moisturizer says it can be used with actives, retinol, and essentially your entire current skincare routine both morning and evening. I think using this morning and night along with my preexisting routine of acids and tretinoin might have just been a little too much for my skin. When I cut back to using it in just the morning I noticed I only had a small breakout once. Despite these breakouts I do think the overall texture of my skin improved, and the glow and hydration I had when I was wearing it was truly noticeable in the best way. I would definitely purchase the refill when I run out, as well as try other products from this brand. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: A luxurious and effective night cream
reviews.review_text: I thoroughly enjoyed using the Extreme Cream as a nighttime moisturizer, as it is a bit too heavy for my oily-combo skin to use in the morning. While the lifting effects take time to see, I woke up with noticeably firmer and smoother skin. I'm truly surprised by how effective this cream was, as others don't make a clear difference to my skin aside from providing basic moisturization. I also was hesitant that the bio-retinol would react with my skin, as various products with regular retinol and bakuchiol have immediately caused breakouts for me, but this was the first product with a similar ingredient to be compatible with my skin! I can see myself purchasing the refills in the future and highly recommend this cream to anyone looking to target signs of aging. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry, sensitive skin and need SO MUCH MOISTURE but find that most moisturizers that have enough hydration are too thick and donu2019t sit well under makeup. Extreme Cream has worked extremely well for me u2014 I started out just using it at night because of its slippy texture, but after loving it so much in the evening I decided to give it a try under makeup and found it works incredibly well, as long as I give it some time to dry down before applying sunscreen and makeup. It has no scent and has not irritated my sensitive skin at all. It has helped immensely with dry patches on the lower part of my face that looked terrible under makeup, and I feel that the overall texture of my skin has improved. I love the refillable system and will definitely be taking advantage, though I wish there was a lighter option for travel, as the outer glass bottle is heavy and bulky. But thatu2019s the only slightly negative thing I have to say about this u2014 itu2019s a fantastic moisturizer that feels and performs like a much more expensive product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin soaked it in! I used three pumps of this cream as part of my evening routine and the texture and experience is very similar to a rich cream that is three times more expensive. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product makes my face feel extremely moisturized and hydrated. I use this moisturizer in place of my daily skincare routine for the mornings and evenings. The glass bottle makes this product feel very luxurious and high-end. I appreciate that this product is fragrance-free. It has a subtle smell to it, but it doesn't bother me at all and doesn't linger on the face for too long. After using this product for quite some time, I notice that my skin feels a bit more glowy and hydrated than before. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Extreme Cream morning and night for the last month and overall I like this cream! The scent is very light for those who are sensitive to smells. The ingredients are exactly what I would want in an anti-aging cream - peptides, bio-retinol and ceramides! It is quite emollient and pretty nourishing and sinks into the skin well. I have dry skin so this is good for summer, but during winter I might need something heavier. I noticed that my skin was nicely moisturized after using and a bit tightened and brighter, especially when I first began using the product. I do think the bottle, while nice, is hard to travel with and the size is a bit misleading but Sephora does offer a refill for it. Overall I really like this cream!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! I'm 41, doing my best to combat aging, and constantly dealing with dry skin. Extreme Cream is exactly what I needed!   My favorite part of this cream is how moisturizing it is without feeling heavy or thick. I used this morning and night daily for four weeks and noticed lifting in my jaw and lower face area, increased hydration, and an overall glow to my skin. I used the entire bottle during this 4 week period using 2-3 pumps each time, and purchased another bottle right away. I love the way it feels and how it looks under makeup. It plays well with all of my makeup products.  I was able to continue using Tretinoin although there were a few instances in which I noticed some spicyness around my eyes after applying Extreme Cream. I adjusted my application routine, and waited a bit longer to apply Extreme Cream, focusing on the rest of my face (forehead, cheeks, chin,) first, then applying to the eye area.   Overall, Extreme Cream gets a 10 out of 10!  I 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this as my daily moisturizer for about a month, and I've really enjoyed it. The packaging feels luxury, the cream is moisturizing without being too heavy, and I did not experience any breakouts/irritation. I took off one star because I didn't see any noticeable changes to fine lines or firmness of my skin (I am 27 with some fine lines but no major concerns there). Also, as others have mentioned, the glass container feels very unnecessarily large and heavy. Overall I've been enjoying this product and will continue using it until I finish the bottle.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Delivers solid moisture in a pretty package
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First up, the packaging: beautiful! Heavy, so not ideal to pack for a trip, but a very pretty addition to the bathroom counter.   The texture: Rich, creamy, thiccc. I typically gravitate toward lighter formulas during the summer months, but this never felt too heavy. Morning or night, my skin drank it right up.   The real test: How would it hold up when layering under all my other products? Happy to report, amazingly! Zero issues when worn under sunscreen or makeup. Impressive.   A few cons: I did feel a little bit of tingling/spiciness when I first started using it, but it eventually went away. Also, I did experience some peeling in the nose area.  Results: Not sure I got the firming or lifted effect, but definitely felt more glowy. Overall, itu2019s not replacing my go-to moisturizers, but a really solid one that Iu2019m hearing is comparable to much higher-end products.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thereu2019s so much to love about this moisturizer. The reverse emulsion is great, it wears GREAT under makeup and I didnu2019t experience any pilling with the formula when layered with other skincare products.   Itu2019s incredibly nourishing without being too thick and this is where it gets complicated. My first week or so, I wore it morning and night and it left me absolutely hydrated and GLOWING. I was obsessed.   However, as time went on I noticed some congestion just underneath the surface which always means something is getting trapped. I didnu2019t immediately think it was the moisturizer, but eventually I tried using it only at night and noticed a difference.   My takeaway is this product is just a little too heavy on my combo skin in the summer months so Iu2019m bummed about that, but feel it would be amazing to bring back in the fall/winter.   All in all a mostly good product, but just be mindful of your skin type. If your skin prefers gel formulas for example, I would be aware it could be a touch too heavy.   I didnt experience any reactions and continued to use retinol products as well. Bottle is a nice weight, although not sure how much product you actually get. Would be curious to see the refills.   Def try it out! Thanks Gloss Angeles for the opportunity to test!

reviews.review_title: Brought energy back into my face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this product makes my skin look - glowy but not greasy. My skin looks hydrated and healthy. I will say that the first couple weeks I used this moisturizer, my skin felt super dry. Ever since my second postpartum, my skin has been extremely dry and dehydrated. While this cream is rich, Iu2019d wake up and my skin would feel dry to the touch (a bit of a sandpaper effect to me). After a couple weeks I stopped having that issue. I donu2019t know if it was a change in the weather (entering into summer) or my skin adjusting to the product, but either way, in the end, I loved the results and will continue using. Iu2019m in my early 30s, and I donu2019t have many signs of aging yet, but I did notice that my fine lines seemed less noticeable after a month of using consistently twice a day. I also love the way my face looks when using - defined, healthy, glowy. I often feel like I look chronically tired, and Extreme Cream really reversed that for me and brought some energy back into my face. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Extreme Cream for the last month day and night and itu2019s a new staple in my skincare routine.
