reviews.review_title: Great under makeup, not for acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cream morning and night for four weeks as part of testing through Gloss Angeles Confudential. I really wanted to love it for everyday use after hearing rave reviews, but it ended up being a bit too rich for my acne-prone skin in the summer humidity. After a few days, I unfortunately started getting small breakouts on my chin that persisted on/off throughout the four weeks. The cream was a nice consistency out of the bottle but turned very oily as soon as I applied it to my skin, so I think this would be better for me to use only at night or to test out in the winter when my skin tends to dry out. To my surprise though, when I applied this cream alone under makeup, my skin looked flawless and my makeup held up even at an outdoor July wedding in the southeast. Overall, I wouldnu2019t risk using this cream again during the summer for fear of clogging my pores, but I will probably be purchasing a refill to test out in the winter and/or even just to wear as a primer under makeup. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After four weeks of using this cream, it has become my holy grail product.   Pros: It is VERY moisturizing. It works under every product Iu2019ve used - primer, sunscreen, foundation- never pills at all. It leaves a bit of a shine that eliminates the need for any of the popular u201cglowu201d products.   Cons: the bottle is heavy and a little bulky.   Results: immediate shine and plumping of fine lines. Over time I also saw a reduction in fine lines and a better skin tone and texture to the point that I SERIOUSLY stopped wearing foundation.   This is THE PRODUCT Iu2019ll buy over and over again.    Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm cautiously optimistic of products that make firming and lifting claims, but this product visibly plumped and firmed my skin, a change that was particularly noticeable around my nasolabial folds and jawline. I just turned 40, and while I have pretty decent skin thanks to genetics, melanin, and good habits, I am noticing some effects of gravity around these areas. I used this morning and evening as directed for a month, and the immediate nourishing moisture this provides is undeniable. Over a few weeks, I noticed my jawline appeared more defined and cheeks seemed more lifted. Deeper lines appeared softened. The cream has an irresistible texture, one I have yet to experience in a product before, and this made me look forward to using it. At night, I apply it all over my face, neck and chest, then I spot-treat by adding a little more to my areas of concern: nasolabial folds, elevens, jawline, and outer-eye corners. I then try to wait about 20-30 minutes for it to soak in before my head hits the pillow. The packaging is quite beautiful; the bottle's size and heft (it's glass) do make it seem like there's more than 1.7 oz. That said, the product has a juicy, luxurious texture, and a little goes a long way (especially in the warmer months). Iu2019ve purchased a refill and look forward to seeing what results I can achieve the longer I use it. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the past four weeks and I definitely notice a major improvement in my skin. It looks firmer and my faint fine lines are nearly gone. For context, I have extremely sensitive skin that can dry out really easily so I keep my routine as limited as possible and really focus on keeping it hydrated. I never had one issue with it breaking me out (and Iu2019m telling you most stuff does break me out.) The only thing I would say is by day 6 I noticed my skin was starting to feel a bit dry so I backed off for a few days to just the morning time and my skin corrected itself and then I built back up to twice daily. I love that it goes on smoothly and you can instantly feel an improvement in the firmness of your skin. Again if youu2019re on the dryer side you want to use with caution especially in the summer but it was a mild dry feeling I got so it may have been something else that contributed to it. Regardless I would definitely recommend if youu2019re looking for a clean product that helps with the overall appearance of your skin.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using 2-3 pumps of this moisturizer morning and night for 4 weeks and can say that I am so impressed! I have noticed that my skin is more balanced, a smoother texture, and more radiant. It is has become my holy grail moisturizer that is hydrating but not too greasy, looks great on bare skin, and works well under makeup. I really appreciate that they have made a refill to into the bottle and I will definitely be repurchasing this as part of my skincare routine! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great all two in one moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a quite a luxurious cream! I'm very much a try to combine my products and this was a great two in one and saved me time! Plus I've heard it's a really good dupe for Augustinus Bader cream and who doesn't love to save money in this day and age! Felt really good on my skin and made my skin much brighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a self proclaimed makeup/skincare enthusiast, I have truly tried countless brands to find my perfect moisturizer. For context, my skin type is normal but leans towards dry. Iu2019m a longtime follower of the u201cGloss Angelesu201d podcast and cohost, Kirbie, put this brand and product on my radar. Her glowing reviews and specific comment of u201cAugustinus Bader dupeu201d at a fraction of the cost really drew me in and in turn, I kept this product in my orbit to try in the future. When I was selected to test this product, I was in pure shock and disbelief, but ultimately so grateful and excited for what was to come. Upon the first application, I instantly fell in love - specifically, the luxurious texture and the plump feeling it left my skin as it completely drank it up! I donu2019t consider myself particularly sensitive to scented products and I would agree that this falls in the u201cnon scentedu201d bucket as advertised. If you are someone who has scent sensitivities, I find it wears off within five minutes tops. Each morning and evening, I apply three pumps and disperse on my face, decolletage, and the residual on my hands. As a major positive, I didnu2019t experience any pilling of sunscreen or makeup, but I do let the product absorb for ~10 minutes prior to applying anything additional. Within the first week of testing, I initially noticed slight firming and a reduction of noticeable pores. After the second week of testing, I noticed my hands were noticeably firm and were less dry. After the third week of testing, I noticed wrinkles on my forehead and around my eyes have magically reduced. As someone who has dabbled in preventative Botox, this is a pleasantly surprising alternative method! That being said, I will certainly continue to purchase the refills going forward as itu2019s honestly become a holy grail in my skincare line up. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this amazing opportunity!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extreme Cream is a thick, luxurious feeling moisturizer. It leaves my skin glowing like no other product - itu2019s perfect for a SUPER dewy look. It also layers really well under makeup and with other skincare. It does have a slight scent but it doesnu2019t bother me.  The first week was an adjustment period for my skin with the cream. I had a lot of chin peeling at first and some burning/spiciness, but my skin adjusted to it. I still occasionally feel some minor burning on my neck but not always. I may not recommend this if you have sensitive skin or really oily skin.   I have seen really nice results. My skin is so smooth and I just love the way it feels on my skin after application.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous texture and my skin eats it up! Moisturizes and leaves my skin feeling soft and supple.  Have used it night & day for a month with only sunscreen in the day and skin feels great, however it's going to be a fall/winter cream for me.  Need something a little lighter in the summer.  Did not notice any firming/lifting, it's a cream not surgery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Some baseline things to start: I am in my late twenties, have combination skin, and have some fine lines on my forehead and crows feet area. I used this cream morning and night for one month to test it. My initial thoughts were that I loved the glow it gave me, but I didnu2019t love wearing the cream during the day. It worked great under sunscreen and makeup, there was no pilling or anything, it was just too much for my skin type for the summer months. At night, I loved it. The reverse emulsion is such a unique feeling. It comes out of the pump like a traditional thicker cream, but once you rub it between your hands or onto your skin, it u201cbreaksu201d and feels like micellar water. It feels like a sealant on my face honestly, which is great for nighttime for me. With lighter gel creams, I tend to wake up in the morning on the drier side, but I wake up feeling moisturized with this cream. As far as anti aging goes, I do believe the lines on my forehead have become less prominent. I couldnu2019t really get the cream onto my crows feet lines due to the product causing my eyes to sting and water if I got any into them. Overall opinion- this cream is effective, gives a really pretty glow to the skin, and is great for nighttime use for a combo skin girly. Iu2019m excited to try this cream further and see how it feels in the colder, drier months. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Immediate repurchase! This cream feels amazing on my skin, and has become my go to moisturizer. This is the first moisturizer Iu2019ve found that 1) does what it says it does with plumping/firming and 2) works beautifully under makeup. Iu2019d buy this for the way it works under foundation alone, but the skin benefits are a nice plus!  The only downside Iu2019ve found is the packaging. Itu2019s too bulky for travel, and you canu2019t see how much youu2019ve used from the bottle.  Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product morning and night for 4 weeks and within that time, I have to say I have come to love this moisturizer and have noticed a difference in the radiance and firmness of my skin. I am 28 years old, and while I donu2019t have really any pronounced wrinkles, I had began to notice some fine lines and texture around my mouth and eyes. Since using this the texture and fine lines have diminished completely and I have a perfectly balanced complexion, especially when wearing makeup. This sits wonderfully under makeup too, even with a few other products and serums underneath. I really notice the reverse emulsion technology they talk about, it starts off feeling as a thicker cream but once you rub into your skin, it feels like literally butter melting, itu2019s really quite a beautiful experience. Overall, I would purchased this product again, given the many benefits it offers just as a moisturizer. I used other u201cmedical gradeu201d skin care brands, and this moisturizer could definitely replace a few extra steps in my routine! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to really love this product but it did not love me. I have sensitive skin and initially,  I was using it liberally on my face and neck, until my neck broke out. I stopped using on my neck but continued using on my face. I loved the way it felt and smelled but I think I will use it in the winter since it's super moisturizing and a bit heavy on my skin for summer. It also pilled under my makeup. I will save this as a night time moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I have tried from iNNBEAUTY and am absolutely in love!  My skin drank this moisturizer up and reacted so well to it.  In general, my skin is on the dry side so 2 pumps of this at night was perfect.  I did about 1 pump in the morning this time of year since we are in the middle of hot and humid east coast summer.  In the winter, however, I see myself using minimum 2 pumps morning and night.   This moisturizer worked extremely well under my sunscreen and serums.  I had very mild pilling around my eyes when I used this over my eye cream but it was only a couple of times and most likely because I didn't want for my eye cream. to absorb completely.  I also love that the bottle is refillable!  This is my new ride or die moisturizer for the foreseeable future.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this Cream post accutane journey. It was rich and thick, both which my skin craved for. I tried the Cream on top of many serums, liquid exfoliants, retinol, and under several different types of sunscreens and didn't notice any pilling at all.  Throughout the summer month, I found it too heavy for my AM routine but still used it every night. Living in Canada, your weather goes from extreme hot to extreme cold....I think this will be my winter gem moisturizer.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to use this product for four weeks, twice dailyu2026 and WHOA. This cream is truly a game changer, especially for those of us who have started to experience skin laxity, signs of aging, and seasonal dullness. My skin has noticeably improved in a month, and I donu2019t plan to stop using it.  First off: the experience of Extreme Cream is lovely. I really like the smell; itu2019s lightly woodsy and herbal. Very pleasant, very subtle. Iu2019m sensitive to scents, and this one is natural and dissipates quickly. Some others have reported a u201cburningu201d sensation, which I only experienced mildly for the first three applications or so; it then stopped completely (and never returned). The cream is somehow both luxurious and lightweightu2014 I almost feel like u201ccreamu201d is a misnomer because it quickly melts into your skin and doesnu2019t leave a film of any kind behind. Over the month, I became addicted to putting this on, and Iu2019m not usually a morning moisturizer person (but now I canu2019t imagine not doing so). It makes my skin feel instantly hydrated and smooth.  Secondly: this product plays well with others. I kept the rest of my evening and morning routines the same and the cream worked well with all my toners, serums, retinol products, sunscreen and makeup. No issues there for me, at all. This was a huge win because I didnu2019t want to change any other parts of my skincare regimen. And thereu2019s nothing worse than a moisturizer that makes your makeup pill or do weird stuff. In fact, I felt that using this cream worked almost like a primer for me. It made my makeup application smoother. I found myself putting this on in the morning, throwing on some eye patches, drinking coffee/making kids lunches, and by the time I went back to do makeup my skin looked great and was ready. So high marks for this productu2019s ability to work seamlessly into my current routine.  Thirdu2014 and most impressively: Extreme Cream WORKS. I donu2019t know how well my pictures do this justice, but the tightening in my

reviews.review_title: So Rich and Creamy, Great Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this moisturizer! Itu2019s so rich and goes on beautifully under sunscreen and makeup. Itu2019s five your skin a great glow and I noticed a lot of lifting and tightening of skin. Itu2019s a bit pricey but you get a lot of product   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite face lotion! This product was super hydrating and I found myself excited to use it each night. Iu2019ve previously used much more expensive face lotions like Augustinus Bader, but I actually like this one better! The product goes on smoothly and doesnu2019t leave a weird residue behind. I also appreciate that I can repurchase as a refill which is both cheaper and better for the environment. A win-win! I will 100% be purchasing.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using the moisturizer for a month and normally my skin always needs a little more moisture since I live in Texas (summers are brutal for my skin). I like how it didnu2019t feel heavy during the day under my spf and makeup. But at night I did feel like my skin did need a little bit more and had to add a serum or my go to Argan Oil from Josie Maran. I did feel my skin firmer while using but no drastic change, according to my before and after pics. Itu2019s a great cream to try out for summer or winter but just be cautious if you do have dry skin. I would definitely keep using and plan on exploring some of their other products as well. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 4 weeks at least once daily, sometimes twice a day. My first fear when starting to test this product was that it might pill under my makeup, which is an issue Iu2019ve run into with many other products over the years but not once did it ever pill! I am so happy with this moisturizer. It leaves my skin hydrated and dewy throughout the day.  I have normal to dry skin so I appreciate the extra moisture. Recently I stopped getting Botox due to pregnancy and then breastfeeding.. well after using this product for a week or so I felt like my skin was starting to look like it did when I had Botox. It looks plump and firm and the creases around my eyes diminished. Will definitely recommend and purchase this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for about 4 weeks, both AM and PM. It gives me glowy, dewy skin but not greasy at all. So far, it has played well under my favorite sunscreen (Beauty of Joseon) and under most primers and makeup (only instance of pilling was with sunscreen + ELF Halo Glow Liquid Filter). I found the texture to be pleasant, a little thicker than I am used to for daytime wear but it absorbes well into the skin without leaving an oil slick across my face. For PM use, it has worked well with my actives (retinol, azaleic acid). I did experience some sensitivity in my first week of use but it resolved itself when I backed off my actives for a few days and slowly added them back in.  Results: immediate glowy skin, a tightening sensation, temporary plumping. Did not experience any significant improvement with tone, my hyperpigmentation, or permanent results with fine lines.  All in all, a great product and would highly recommend. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fan of the Mineral Sun Glow and Slushy Serum, I was so excited to try the Extreme Cream and it did not disappoint! I love the texture of the cream u2013 it feels rich without being too heavy, it plays well with all the other products in my routine, and itu2019s a great base under makeup. I have sensitive, acne prone skin, and I used it morning (after mandelic acid) and night (after U Beauty Resurfacing Treatment) and didnu2019t experience any reactions or pilling u2013 it made my skin feel and look great. I recently tried out the U Beauty SUPER Hydrator (pricey!!) which unfortunately caused me to break out, so I was so happy when this worked for me, because IMO, the immediate application effect is similar. My skin feels smoother and plumper, and Iu2019ve noticed my smile lines seem less prominent after using this for a month. Iu2019ve already purchased a refill and canu2019t wait to see how it wears in the winter. I love that this is refillable but I'd like to see a travel size version and more travel friendly packaging because one downside of this product is the size u2013 itu2019s big, bulky, and heavy, and takes up a lot of space on my counter and in my toiletry bag. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to write a review from Gloss Angeles. In short, this is GREAT. While I don't think I saw results, I wasn't expecting to. I already use retinol regularly and get treatments done to induce collagen. I was only looking for a cream to layer well with other products and prevents the occasional retinol purge and this did both in spades.  A little in the mid-priced range and probably the only time I will buy a non-drugstore moisterizer. I've tried different moisterizers in this price range from Tacha to Matter of Fact and I think this pink bottle wins them out. It's so dewy without being overly shiny but then sinks into the skin. Layers well with other products in my routine, including retinol, sunscreen, etc., and make up when I do wear make up. I'd say if you can afford it, buy it. I haven't found a drugstore equivalent to buy. I test out a lot of products but this is definitely going in my rotation. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: InnBeauty Project's 10+10 More-sturizer has been my holy grail moisturizer for a few years now, so I was very excited to try the Extreme Cream. This product had one of the most unique textures I've ever felt in a moisturizer. It feels like a thick cream initially and then as you rub it in it bursts and becomes almost slippery but in a good way. It's hard to explain, but I really enjoyed it! It doesn't feel too thick on the face but does feel very moisturizing. However, it's a bit thick for me under sunscreen in the summer when my skin is more oily and prefer it for night. I found the scent to be a little bit herbal but faded quickly.  I have been using this product for about a month and my skin definitely feels smooth, clear, and hydrated, but on occasion it can feel a little spicy around my naturally sensitive eyelids. Overall, I think it's a nice moisturizer with a really cool texture. It's a bit too expensive for me (even just the refill) to purchase all the time, but I can see a lot of people loving this. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After testing this product for a couple of weeks, I definitely have noticed glowy and more even toned skin! My skin type is sensitive acne prone. I first tried to use it twice a day and had to lay off as my skin was definitely feeling spicy and started peeling (no redness or irritation though!). I now use it about 4-5 times a week at night and always wake up with glowy hydrated skin and have not experienced any breakouts from it. I actually think it helped heal any small breakouts I had faster. The only downside is the size of the packaging. Itu2019s huge and hard to travel with. Hoping for a travel size in the future! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this testing opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Great product, but not a daily product for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product, however, over the course of 4 weeks, I realized that the bio-retinol ingredients are a bit too intense for my skin. The first week, everything felt great. Second week, I felt more stinging around the sensitive areas of the eyes. Third and Fourth week, I felt like my skin texture was getting drier and tougher. My skin is a bit sensitive to retinols, but I wanted to use the product consistently to see how it impacted my skin before I stopped. After this experience, I'd cycle this product into my regimen, but not use it daily and mostly at night. I do love the texture, but my dry skin likes more hydrating and thicker formulas to feel quenched. During these last four weeks, I would put a layer of this, and then add another moisturizer on top before my sunscreen and make-up. No flaking or pilling, so it layers great. The packaging was lovely, and I'll totally keep using the product, but just not daily AM and PM.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this because the feel of it is so unique. It goes on thick but as you rub it in it feels like water, itu2019s super cool! But instantly my skin had a bad reaction - intense burning and bright red. I donu2019t consider myself to have sensitive skin so this was really odd. I even tried to use it on my hands instead and that burned too. I must have an allergy to something in this product, which Iu2019ve never experienced before. I will say for my super dry skin I would need to use another moisturizer on top. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this product as it was extremely hydrating and make my skin feel very silky and smooth! I did not feel like I needed to use an additional serum with it for extra hydration. It gives a very dewy finish. The bottle also lasts a very long time. I think this will be ideal for the winter time as it is so hydrating. I did not experience any pilling under SPF or makeup. It did make my skin look more plump the next morning.  The only downside was that it felt too oily for daytime and did cause some minor breakouts on my acne prone skin. I am overall very pleased with this moisturizer!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using Extreme Cream for a little more than a month, I'm surprised to say that I can see visible improvements to my skin! I have normal to oily skin, and am starting to develop lines on my forehead. I enjoyed the smooth, thick texture of this cream. It immediately sinks in but still feels hydrating past the immediate application. I found the scent of this product pleasant, it's a light scent but goes away pretty quickly anyway.   When using this cream, my skin immediately looks visibly plumper. Happy to say that after just 4 weeks, I can see that the main wrinkle on my forehead looks significantly less prominent :) While I used this consistently AM/PM, I think I'll continue with mainly PM use. It paired nicely with my SPF and didn't seem to cause that much more oilyness during the day, but at least for the summertime I'll keep it to PM use. Will definitely re-up on this when I run out.  One comment about the packaging: I love the idea of a refillable product, but while the glass bottle feels very luxe it's pretty clunky compared to the actual component that holds the cream. It's a bit inconvenient to travel with. Still giving this 5 stars for overall performance!  Thank you so much to Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use two different moisturizers, one for a.m. and one for p.m. Itu2019s twice as costly and takes up twice as much space, but I can never seem to find a formula that serves me well for both and night....until now. Extreme Cream is the perfect balance of thick and quick. It feels like a luxurious night cream but absorbs fast, leaving a supple yet matte finish. It also wears perfect under SPF and provides great moisture that lasts all day.  My only critique is in the packaging.  The glass bottle is huge, I feel like there is a lot of wasted space. Even though it's refillable, the refill also has a lot of packaging.  I'm not sure how eco-friendly the setup is. Regardless,  the formula is fantastic. I will certainly continue to use and repurchase.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity to try this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say I really was on the fence with how best to review this cream. I feel like trialing it in the summer might not have been the best idea, since this really is a deeply nourishing cream which to me was just way to much to use morning and evening (as recommended for the desired effects). Despite it being so rich (it honestly feels like AB The Rich Cream, in a great way - thank you reverse emulsion!) it also had the strange effect of leaving my face a peeling mess about half the time (particularly in on my forehead and nasolabial folds). I stopped using my tret while on this for the month, but that didnu2019t really make any difference. I also got some increased congestion on my chin - sigh. Overall, I really like this cream but for me I could only tolerate it nightly and at times found myself layering a more simple moisturizer over it in the areas I was peeling. YMMV but I do think their clinical trial data are legit and the skin-feel is really lovely which is why Iu2019m giving it 3/5 stars. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating but not too heavy for summer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! My combination skin was feeling so dry and dehydrated prior to trying this, since starting I feel much more hydrated. It's heavy in texture but doesn't feel heavy on my skin, even in humidity. I can easily wear this day and night. It works well with my other products also. I don't notice any fragrance which I like, overall the product is great. The packaging is refillable, when you repurchase you get the refill size and insert it into the bottle. A downside (one star off)  is that the packaging is heavy and unfortunately mine rolled out of my travel bag and landed on the tile floor of my hotel bathroom and shattered, so I'd say it's a bit fragile. Also because it's opaque you can't tell how much product is left in the bottle.  I will definitley continue using this moisturizer but I may put it into a travel container for weight and so I can see how much I have left.  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: LOVE for my oily skin even in summer.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My only complaint about this product is that there is way less of it than you think there will be because of the bottle being heavy. Still I will rebuy. The positives/ I have oily skin and usually have to be incredibly careful with what moisturizers I use in the summer. But this product has been a game changer for my skin! Glowy but not shiny and goes beautifully under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with the Innbeauty Project Extreme Cream! As someone with extremely dry, sensitive skin, I was skeptical to try this moisturizer when I noticed the relatively lightweight, thin texture. But this one exceeded my expectations.  - Ultra-light texture  - Absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue - Provides solid hydration despite its lightweight feel - Works well under makeup - no pilling or caking - No adverse skin reactions  While I can't speak to long-term anti-aging effects yet, it seems promising.  If you're looking for a moisturizer that multitasks without causing irritation, I recommend giving this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been 1 month since I started using this moisturizer twice daily and Iu2019ve been loving it! My skin is soft, hydrated, and I truly do feel like itu2019s more firm and lifted! I did experience a transition period with a few blemishes, but this could have been hormonal acne as well. It cleared up with time. This could be a little heavy for those with very oily skin, but it works well for my combo skin even in summer! Applies beautifully under makeup. I will definitely purchase a refill. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for the opportunity!

reviews.review_title: Effective results but so-so user experience
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been testing this product for a little over a month and have mixed feelings about it. I live in the Midwest where it is currently hot and humid with skin that is acne prone and tends to lean oily. If I used this during the day along with my usual serum and SPF, I found it to be too rich and caused some congestion. After about 2 weeks I decided to use it in the evenings only but the last week or so I've been feeling like my skin still feels too dry. I can physically feel the product on my face but areas of my face just felt tight, like it still wasn't moisturized enough, and I found myself reaching for other products to top things off with to give my face the cushy, hydrated feeling I was after. I'm just turning 38 and have visible signs of aging and do feel like I've seen improvements in my laugh lines and also the vertical lines on my chest, but I'm finding I'm not loving the way my skin feels with it. I do think in the winter when it's cold, snowy and dry that I would enjoy this as my day cream however and plan on giving it ago again once cooler weather roles around. I do love that it's refillable, and the price point is great for the ingredients. It does smell initially like crayons to me but I appreciate that it does not contain fragrance and any scent disappeared quickly. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidental for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially, I noticed my skin peeling around my nose area and also pilling when applying sunscreen following. I broke out a little bit on my forehead also. I was nervous that this product wasnu2019t going to work for me.  After 2 weeks, my skin not only adjusted but thrived! The texture and firmness of my skin was noticeably improved. I also applied the product to my neck area and was most impressed with the firmness results around u201ctech necku201d lines. I absolutely love this product and that they sell refillable inserts to be more waste conscious.

reviews.review_title: Feels great, not sure it did much!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product twice a day for about 5 weeks! Iu2019m not sure Iu2019m the target audience for u201cfirmingu201d or u201cliftingu201d but unfortunately I didnu2019t notice much difference in the appearance of my fine lines on my forehead and around my eyes. I LOVE the way this cream feels u2014 it feels rich and luxurious without feeling too thick or heavy. It worked well in my existing night routine with niacinamide serum and a retinol cream. It also worked great under makeup with my vitamin C serum! I have sensitive skin but this cream never bothered me. This cream didnu2019t smell out of the bottle, but somehow once I put it on my skin it smelled pretty gross for 15-30 minutes after! Despite loving how the cream felt, I guess Iu2019m just not sure itu2019s worth $48!

reviews.review_title: Love this product, i plan to get the re-fill!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been testing Extreme Cream for a few weeks and my expectations were exceeded. Since I was testing this product, I tried to have a consistent routine, but it mixed well with all of the products I typically use, no pilling. I suspected the cream would be too heavy during the day in humid NC summer heat, but it never felt too heavy. I liked using during the day and night. If anything, i'd use one pump during the day if I was trying to anticipate hot weather. I love the reverse emulsion texture, it felt elegant and the finish was very nice - top tier! I didn't really discern any scent - and wasn't really conscious of any scent though some in our testing slack channel did. My skin does feel more firm but i honestly want to keep using longer to see i notice a more discernible change. I plan to get a refill once it runs out because i like it so much and I think the pricepoint is great for what it is and how it compares to luxury moisturizers that are marketing anti-aging in their claims. I also like how weighty the packaging feels and love the rose gold dispener. Not really any downsides other than maybe the bottle could be smaller considering it's like 1.7oz. It's big to travel with. Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was immediately intrigued in this moisturizer because I kept hearing it being compared to a way more expensive product I've yearned for but just couldn't justify spending big bucks for. This cream did not disappoint. First, the price is right. Second, it has no fragrance, and third, it did not break me out (I've got super sensitive skin). My skin felt hydrated all day, and it's great for overnight-not too heavy, just right! Lastly, I use tanning drops every few days and they blended seamlessly! I've already purchased a refill.   Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Give this moisturizer a shot! It was my first time trying this product and after a month of use, it is now a staple in my skincare routine! I am in my late 30s, have sensitive/reactive skin that is dry in the winter and oily in the summer, and this product moisturized my skin without breakouts/irritation. I love how this product sinks into my skin quickly and provides all day moisture and hydration. My favorite application was with my AM skincare routine and it really made my skin glow and smooth. It applies well under a full face of makeup as well as with a minimal skincare routine with SPF (no pilling). I did not notice my skin being lifted/firm with use, but that aspect does not bother me. I love the price point and the refillable packaging. I have already repurchased this product because I love it so much! Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if I've ever felt so attached to a product (ever?). In about a month of 2x a day of usage, my face is brighter and seems brighter (reduced redness). The texture is divine, its unscented but has a super mild and slightly enjoyable natural smell, is pretty thick but easy to move around/quickly absorbs, and leaves my skin feeling hydrated immediately - honestly, if I didn't know the price, I would say it's an easy upgrade/substitute for the bader cream. I will say the bottle is *large*, but you can order refills and save a pretty good amount. Anyway, I'm going out of town, and while I'm not done with my first bottle, I ordered another to make sure I don't go without it! Thank you, Gloss Angeles Confidential, for this opportunity!

reviews.review_title: The secret to glowy, bouncy skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll preface this by saying that I'm usually a gal who loves a nice lightweight gel moisturizer over a heavier cream, but after a month of using this day and night, I may be a convert. At first I thought the texture was something I would only want to use at night, but after seeing how glowy my skin looked in the mornings, I decided to give it a go for AM use too. It makes skin look nice and hydrated without feeling greasy. With my typical gel moisturizers, that glow would usually go away after about an hour, but I feel like this cream makes skin look glowy for hours on end.  As for lifting and firming, it's hard to say if I saw any difference in my skin, but I do think it has a bit more bounce to it.  My skin also did experience some slight peeling after about a week and a half, but I used a gentle exfoliator every 2-3 days to slough off dry skin and that helped. Once my skin got past that phase, I found that it really brought out the glow. And now I wonder how many more times can I say glow in this review, but it really did work its magic in this department!   The one drawback is that it's a fairly heavy bottle and not so travel-friendly, but I do love the idea of the refill option!  Thank you Gloss Angeles Confidential for this opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fallen madly in love with every INNBeauty product I have ever tried and their new Extreme Cream is no exception! Itu2019s a beautifully thick and rich cream, but isnu2019t heavy - so it applies wonderfully to the skin but absorbs just as well and doesnu2019t leave you feeling sticky or like you have a thick layer of product sitting on your face. My skin immediately felt softer and better hydrated, so itu2019s a great option for the dry winter weather weu2019ve been experiencing but I also donu2019t think it will be too much even when summer rolls around. My skin definitely feels plumped and super soft. And after a couple of weeks of use I feel like Iu2019m starting to notice some improvement in firmness around my jawline. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to admit that this may be my favorite product from this brand yet. This is a thicker cream, but it still manages to have a unique twist to it. It feels a bit more emollient (imagine mixing a drop of oil into moisturizer - except there's no need to add that additional step with this cream). This serves a dual purpose: softening dry skin and also adding a beautiful glow to the skin.  Now, as a person who works in research myself, I have to admit that I heavily side-eyed the claims on lifting. At the very least, I expected to see a consumer perception study (meaning: they asked people did this lift your skin? and they answered probably!) But I gotta give it to Innbeauty: it looks like they did indeed hire a third party lab to analyze real skin for the results. I admit I'm still a bit skeptical, but perhaps peptides do hold promise (or perhaps ceramides/bisabolol/etc firm skin via strengthening?)  In terms of what I have noticed, I will say that my dry skin LOVES this cream. I love how it instantly moisturizes and gives me a glow, I love how nicely it glides on my skin, and I love it under makeup. I'm also glad to see this is a refillable system, wherein there is a reasonable discount/incentive to repurchase. $40 to pick up another beautiful cream? Well thought out, Innbeauty!  My only additional commentary is that I think oily skin types might not love this - for all of the reasons that my dry skin type does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a product from Innbeauty project, so I did not know what to expect, but I turned out to be pleasantly surprised! The packaging is a little different; very study, modern and a generous amount of product. I like the pump to get the perfect amount of product every time, and to keep bacteria etc out. I have dry skin and like nice, thick products and this product absorbs pretty well into my skin, I think it will be the perfect consistency for my skin in the summer. Feels nice and nourishing, tingles a little but no irritation. The scent is very mild and pleasant as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is super luxurious and sturdy. I am in my late 20's starting to see crow feet while smiling; I am using this cream at night so that it has time to work. I can see the plumpness and youthfulness for sure. Moisturizes well and is suiting my skin type. I would buy it again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice moisturizer. It has a great texture, it absorbs into the skin quickly and doesnu2019t leave an oily residue. Itu2019s very hydrating and layers well under my makeup. My only issue is it has a bit of a strange scent. Im very sensitive to fragrance, so others may not even notice, but Iu2019m not a fan of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream for a couple of weeks and I have noticed some significant improvement to my skin. The texture is softer, the skin appear more supple and hydrated, and I am hoping this cream will improve the firmness in my jaw area

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice moisturizer I have only used it for a week I really like the packaging !! Canu2019t wait to see what affects it has on me I will definitely update in a month or so but so far so good no breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sheu2019s thick and moisturizing for my dry skin! I like the packaging and itu2019s not greasy feeling on my skin. Great for night time or during the cold weather which is perfect! Loving the ingredients and hoping to see the firming and lifting results with consistent use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Get it. As someone with sensitive and dehydrated skin, itu2019s so hard to find a skincare product that fits this category and that isnu2019t making my skin burn. Really enjoying how hydrating and soft this feels and it looks great under makeup. The packaging also deserves a shout out! Much more heavy and luxe feeling than I had anticipated. I had to read the product description a couple times to make sure it wasnu2019t for the body lol itu2019s huge! Very impressed with the whole experience.  In my pic, Iu2019m showing my skin from a while before the after where my skin was dry and irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a moisturizer that layers well over serums and under makeup, this is it! If you are looking for a moisturizer that plumps and firms, this is it! Needless to say, Iu2019m obsessed! Definitely a new staple in my skincare routine, itu2019s so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I am pleasantly shocked by this product. I did not expect to like it so much, let alone immediately have my SO try it as well! The instant lift and glow was all I needed, but the size of the bottle makes it better ud83dude4cud83cudffe

reviews.review_text: A firming cream that ACTUALLY firms. I can visibly see and feel a huge difference. Iu2019ve never been more blown away by a product, it also totally made my skin look and feel more supple. I will totally be coming back for more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: * I love using this new lifting moisturizer. I have been using it every morning before my makeup and my skin looks hydrated and flawless all day. Great lightweight and quickly absorbing without any strong scent. Beautiful large packaging and easy to apply. My skin looks brighter and smoother. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love and adore the brand Inn beauty project and the extreme cream firming & lifting moisturizer doesnu2019t disappoint. I love that my skin immediately feels plump and hydrated which I I want in a skincare product. Plus the packaging is so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I wore this moisturizer under my makeup and it made my face more smoother. It made my skin hydrated and moisturized. I noticed it made it brighter over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is super cold outside and this extreme cream moisturizer is everything your skin will need . My skin feels super hydrated and plump at the same time . Beautiful heavy packaging , not ideal for traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This extreme cream moisturizer has really been helping my dry skin to look and feel more plump and hydrated. I especially like the effect when I use this overnight on top of an HA serum for extra moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes
reviews.review_text: Gifted. The packaging is a beautiful heavy glass bottle, although it feels a little bit bulky and takes some space on my counter. The formula is a dense cream that feels very decadent and hydrating on the skin. It leaves a very dewy glow and makes my skin super hydrated and nourished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: From the 1st application my face felt softer, firmer and cleaner. It adheres quickly to the skin and has a very mild smell, you can hardly feel it... I only use it in the morning, but I think I will use it day and night to get more benefit. It has definitely become one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So creamy! I loved the texture! It is more on the thicker side which I like since I have drier skin specially around the winter time. It doesnu2019t have any smell but also doesnu2019t feel heavy nor made me break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the extreme cream firming moisturizer by Innbeauty project. The packaging was beautiful and the bottle looks luxurious. I loved the texture of the moisturizer. My skin felt super hydrated, nourished, and with a warm glow. I used it during my morning skincare routine. The ingredients are clean with retinol, peptides and ceramides. Vegan and cruelty free. I loved this product!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: InnBeauty's New Extreme Cream is a skincare revelation! The texture is luxuriously smooth, and it absorbs like a dream, leaving my skin feeling deeply nourished. The results are visible u2013 my complexion appears more radiant and hydrated. I appreciate that it's suitable for all skin types. The packaging is chic, and a little goes a long way, making it worth every penny. It has earned its spot as a staple in my skincare routine. A solid 5-star product for achieving that coveted healthy glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This luxe, rich cream moisturizer leaves my skin feeling really nice and really soft. Love the texture and love the smell. The packing is also very nice . I belive I found my new fevorite moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s the first product that I tried from this brand and first I love the design of the brand and this product has a huge bottle and I think is worth it the price. I use the product and I felt my skin bright, moisturizer and soft. I really liked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the hefty glass packaging with a pump, but do note that it takes up a lot of space for a 50 ml product. The consistency is thick, a little goes a long way. It has a slight sweet scent that is hardly noticeable. This is SO GOOD for my dry skin even in the coldest of winter. It keeps it hydrated overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing!! First of all, the bottle is very heavy and feels very luxurious. Itu2019s a large bottle with a nice pump to dispense the cream. The cream fells rich and balmy but it doesnu2019t feel heavy on the skin. It melts into the skin similar to any oil but it doesnu2019t feel greasy. It just gives my skin a beautiful glow and feels super moisturizing and hydrating. I find I only need a little bit. In the morning, my skin looks and feels totally refreshed! Itu2019s like I had a facial while I was asleep! My skin is plump, super smooth, really soft, and looks glowing! I love the way it makes my skin feel and look. Itu2019s definitely become a staple in my routine!

reviews.review_title: I have seen a difference this week!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy moly! This has been amazing already! I am over 40 and my skin looks so good this week. This goes on so smooth and feels amazing. I have been looking for something. That would help with my fine lines and wrinklesu2014but also help firm my skin. I am loving this. Canu2019t wait to keep using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love  this amazing moisturizer thatu2019s so hydrating and nourishing,not greasy at all plus  has no scent and absorbs  nicely into skin giving that hydrating feeling in an instant and the glowing finish under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is luxurious! It is bigger than I expected. I like its silky texture which instantly absorbs into skin. It hydrates my skin immediately with a glow finish. I found it's good to be used both day and night. As a night cream, my skin feels softer in the next morning. As a day cream, it preps skin ready for the makeup. Love it!
